chinese: 老耿端起枪，眯缝起一只三角眼，一搂扳机响了枪，冰雹般的金麻雀劈哩啪啦往下落，铁砂子在柳枝间飞迸着，嚓嚓有声。
english: Old Geng picked up his shotgun, squinted, and pulled the trigger. Two sparrows crashed to the ground like hailstones as shotgun pellets tore noisily through the branches.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Old Geng lifted his rifle and narrowed his eyes, as if preparing to fire.砰—一声闷响, 并一颗颗僵梆梆的豌豆般的小子弹射到远处, 引来一阵豌豆般激烈的喧啸,嚓—一声, 一枚铁钉从枝条间掉了。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Old Geng took up his gun, squinted one of its triangular eyes, and pulled the trigger. A hail of gold finches came down from the sky, pattering on the willows, with sand whistling through the branches.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Old Geng raised the rifle, squeezed one tiny trigger, and let ice-cold bullets rain down on the sparrows, cracking擎起的一串火花在柳条间爆裂,发出当当的响声。
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Old Geng raised his gun, squinting one of his triangular eyes, and with a pull of the trigger, bullets rained down like hailstones, smashing golden sparrows into pieces. The iron sand flew between the willow branches, making a snipping sound.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

Old Geng raised his gun, narrowed his eyes into a triangle, and pulled the trigger. The sound of the gunshot was like ice rain, and the gold bullets flew down, hitting the iron sand on the willow branches with a clatter.

chinese: 次日天未明时，刘老老便起来梳洗了， 又将板儿教了几句话； 五六岁的孩子，听见带了他进城逛去，喜欢的无不应承。
english: Next day Grannie Liu was up before dawn. As soon as she had washed and done her hair, she set about teaching Ban-er a few words to say to the ladies at the great house – an exercise to which he submitted cheerfully enough, as would any little boy of four or five who had been promised an outing to the great city.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It was still not light when this little update took place. Grannie Liu起了个早，到锅台上梳妆，又把翠枝道人给吴芸讲了几套话。等到天亮些时候，才叫他进城去逛。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: By the time the next day dawned, Liu Lao got up and washed himself; he also taught him a few words of boarder speech. The five or six year old boy was delighted when he heard that he would be taken to the city to visit.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Having been woken just before daybreak, Grannie Liu rose up and began to prepare for her visit. She dressed little Ban-er in his best and then, as he sat silently while she carried him round the neighbourhood demonstrating what he knew, put him on his feet in the front of his little shop and sent him out with the other boys to 'admit' children.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The next morning, before daybreak, Old Liu got up to wash and dress, and taught Baoer a few words; a five or six-year-old child, hearing that they were going into the city for a stroll, was delighted and readily agreed.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

The next day, Liu Lao Lao woke up early, brushed her hair, and gave her granddaughter a few words of advice before going into the city with her. The six-year-old girl was thrilled and responded enthusiastically.</s>

chinese: 钱老板道：“是，是，多谢香主。” 在一张椅上坐了，续道：“属下将小郡主藏在猪肚里带进宫来，一来是为瞒过宫门侍卫的重重搜检，二来是要瞒过沐王府众人的耳目。
english: 'Thank you, Master,' said Butcher Qian, seating himself in one of the chairs and continuing. 'There were really two reasons why I hid the Little Countessinside this pig's carcass. One was to get her past the Palace Guard: they always search everyone at the gate. But it was also to get her past any of the Mu Family spies who might be out watching for us.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Yes, sir,' said Butcher Qian and sat down at the chair. 'I've been told by the Palace Servants that if you search your workshop with a patella and find nothing, you're not to be permitted to cross its gates again for some for certain period of time. Secondly, I'm told you cannot send the Little Countess abroad without my permission.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Mr. Qian said, "Yes, yes, thank you very much." He sat down on a chair and continued, "I hid the young lady under a pig's stomach and brought her into the palace. First of all, I did it to avoid being searched by the guards at the imperial gate. Secondly, I did it to avoid the ears of the沐 family members."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Please, Master, thank you,' said the butcher. He sat himself down on a of the chairs and went on: 'When I brought the Little Countess into the Palace, it was partly to avoid being searched properly by the Palace guards and partly to keep her from the ears of the Mu Family.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Money Master said, "Yes, yes, thank you, Captain." He then sat on a chair and continued, "My subordinate hid the young princess in the pig's stomach and brought her into the palace. The first reason was to evade the thorough inspections by the guards at the palace gates. The second reason was to hide from the notice of everyone in the Mu王府."
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

The boss said, "Yes, thank you for your help." He sat down on a chair and continued, "The subordinate will bring the little princess hidden in the pig's belly into the palace. One reason is to avoid the palace guards' thorough search, and the other is to avoid the eavesdropping of the people in the Mu Wangfu."

chinese: 但已经晚了，物理学家静静地躺在地上，半睁的双眼看着从他的头颅上流出的血迹，疯狂的会场瞬间陷入了一片死寂。
english: But it was already too late. The physicist lay quietly on the ground, his eyes still open as blood oozed from his head. The frenzied crowd sank into silence.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But already then he was too late. The physical scientists laid down half-opened eyes watching the blood-drip from his brain as it slitherged down over his skull. At once he became filled with a single voice: 'Die, man! Die!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: But it was too late. Physicists lay quietly on the ground, their half-opened eyes staring at the bloodstains streaming down from his head. The frenzied crowd instantly fell silent.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It was too late. The physics professor lay on the ground, half-lidded eyes fixed on the blood flowing from his nose. The frenzied crowd collapsed in a moment of silence.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: But it was too late. The physicist lay quietly on the ground, his half-open eyes staring at the blood trickling from his head, and the mad assembly fell instantly into a deathly silence.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

But it was too late. The physicist lay quietly on the ground, half-closed eyes staring at the blood dripping from his head. The frenzied scene was suddenly plunged into a moment of silence.</s>

english: But then Shao did something that no one expected. She married a persecuted high-level cadre from the Education Ministry. At that time, the cadre still lived in a 'cowshed' for reform through labor.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But just then Shao Lin made a surprising turn. She got married. At the time the husband was still in the "shacks" at the labor camp where those受迫害的人被鞭打。

chinese: 湘云道：“你敢挑宝姐姐的短处，就算你是个好的。”
english: 'If you can find any shortcomings in Cousin Bao-chai', said Xiang-yun, 'you must be very good indeed.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If you'll挑过宝姐姐的缺点，也就有了做姐姐的待遇！」
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Xiang Yun said, "You dare pick out the shortcoming of a sister like Bai Jiaer, then you are good."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If you say anything bad about Bao-chai, I'll make you prove yourself a good one,' said Xiang-yun.

chinese: 他知道，这都是被转化为可见光的厘米微波，每团光晕的中心就是一个发射源，由于波长的原因，不可能看清形状。
english: He realized that these were sources of radiation in the centimeter range, all now converted to visible light. At the heart of each halo was a radiation source. Because the original wavelengths were so long, it was impossible to see their shapes clearly.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He knew that they'd all been converted into microwave rays, each ray's center a source of interest. Since the wavelength was such that one could not even see the shape, it would be impossible to do so.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He knew that this was the visible light version of centimeter microwaves, each emitting source being at the center of a ring of light; due to wavelength reasons, it would be impossible to see the shape.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): To him it felt like a new kind of light, formed from the converted cm-waves, which consisted of a collection of luminous disks centered at each location. Since the wavelengths were tiny, they could not reveal the shapes of the objects.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: He knew that these were centimeter microwaves converted into visible light, with each halo's center being a source of emission, shapes impossible to discern due to the wavelength.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

chinese: 海老公问起今日做了什么事，韦小宝说了到鳌拜家中抄家，至于吞没珍宝、金银、匕首等事，自然绝口不提，最后道：“太后命我到鳌拜家里拿两部《四十二章经》……”
english: When Old Hai asked what he had been doing that day, Trinket told him that he had been helping supervise the confiscation of Oboi's estate. He concluded his account—which of course omitted any mention of the dagger and various other valuables that he had pocketed for himself—by telling him about the two copies of the Sutra in Forty-Two Sections that had been discovered in Oboi's house.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): After the old eunuch had finished his interview, Trinket finished with a single statement: 'The Empress Dowager gave me the task of taking two volumes of the Four Twenty-Seventh Book series from Oboi!' and the old eunuch asked if there was to be a discussion on this in the以后。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The sea cucumber asked what he had done today, and Kung-Fu Master Xiao He asked him about it. He said that he went to the home of the regent (Aba) and searched for his treasure, and naturally did not mention things like snatching precious jewels, gold, knives, etc. Finally, he said, "Empress Dowager ordered me to get two copies of the Fourty-Two Chapters of Scripture…."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Old Hai asked him what he had been up to of late. Trinket had told the truth when he said he'd gone to Oboi's house to search for jewels and gold and swords. He hadn't dared mention the prayerbooks. 'The Empress Dowager told me to go to Oboi's home and get two copies of the Forty-Two Sections of the Sutra,' he finished.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The Sea Grandpa asked what he had done that day, and Wei Xiaobao told him about raiding Ao Bao's home. Naturally, he didn't mention the treasures swallowed, gold, silver, daggers, or anything else. He concluded, "Empress Dowager ordered me to fetch two copies of the Forty-two Chapters of the Sutra from Ao Bao's house..."
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

chinese: 贾瑞急的也不敢则声，只得悄悄出来，将门撼了撼，关得铁桶一般。
english: Alarmed, but not daring to make a sound, Jia Rui stealthily crept out and tried it. It was locked—as tight as a bucket.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Jia Rui, however, who had also cowered, could not get out any more. He made a noise with his shoulder, but secretly managed to shake the gate off its hinges and thrust it shut as though closing over a large pot.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Jia Rui was so anxious that he dared not make a sound, and had no choice but to quietly come out. He shook the door and closed it tightly like a pot of iron.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): At the touch of disappointment Jia Rui became so frightened that he left without making a sound and slipped back to his room, closing the door so violently that it sounded as though one of the pillars had broken.

end_header_id|>

Jia Rui was so afraid that he couldn't even make a sound, and could only quietly push the door open and close it with a sound like iron.</s>

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: But I, being reckless and presumptuous, did not ask the Lady Wei for permission before bringing the little princess into the palace, which only added danger and trouble to the Lady Wei, who was already quite troubled. It is most reprehensible.”

chinese: 到潮退时我也安息，但潮兴时要乘兴而舞。
english: When the wave receded, I would rest calmly, but I wanted to dance while the wave was at its peak.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I rested when the water retreated, but got excited about going out again and dancing at any time.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: To rest when the tide recedes, but dance with enthusiasm when it is high.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If the tide returned while I was asleep, I would yourself continue to dance until it receded.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: And when the tide recedes I lie at rest, but when it rises I dance with the surge.

When the tide goes out, I rest. But when the tide comes in, I dance with joy.</s>

chinese: 钱老板接了过来，在猪背上一划，没料到这匕首锋利无匹，割猪肉如切豆腐，一剑下去，直没至柄。
english: Butcher Qian took it from him and made an incision in the back of the pig's carcass. Unaware of the blade's incomparable sharpness, he was somewhat surprised at the ease with which it sank in, at once burying itself up to the hilt and slicing through fat and flesh as if it were bean curd.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Butcher Qian took the weapon both ways and drew the dagger across its blade. Unbeknownst to him, the blade was so long and sharp that it cut the生猪的皮肉如同切碎了豆腐一样进得猪腹中去,一点都没有损坏。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Mr. Quan took it and, with one cut on the pig's back, didn't expect that the knife was as sharp as a razor; he cut through the pork like butter. With one stroke, it went all the way down to the hilt.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But he hadn't counted on the dagger's exceptional sharpness; it cut the meat as though it were rubbly bread, and in seconds ridged the entire back of the chop to the handle.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Mr. Qian took it over and slashed it across the pig's back. He didn't expect the dagger to be so sharp; it cut through the pork like cutting tofu, slicing all the way down to the hilt.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

The boss took the knife and sliced the pig's back without expecting the blade to be so sharp. The knife cut through the meat like butter, all the way to the handle.</s>

chinese: 山上有一股风，无声无息地吹下去。 天地间充满了悲惨的气氛。
english: A current of wind slipped down the mountain without a sound, without a breath, and a sadness in the air filled every space between the sky and the earth.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): There was a wind running free on the mountain, whose actions quiet and gentle never left its field. The world around grew gloomy with sorrow.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: There is a wind on the mountain, it blows silently and steadily down. The atmosphere of the world is full of sorrow.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): A breeze blew on this earth, never having made a sound or noise of itself; and down the mountains went, carried on by that wind, a message of pain and suffering.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: There was a wind on the mountain, blowing down silently. The atmosphere between heaven and earth was filled with a tragic mood.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

On the mountain, there is a breeze that blows silently down. The atmosphere is filled with a tragic mood.</s>

chinese: 说着便令人送女儿进去，自携了雨村来至书房中，小童献茶。
english: So saying, he called for a servant to take the child indoors, while he himself took Yu-cun by the hand and led him into his study, where his boy served them both with tea.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): So saying, he instructed one of the servants to carry Zhou Xiang's daughter into the study and took him back to his own quarters in the same lot. He himself poured out some tea.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He then had the girl sent in, and brought Mr. Rain back to the study, where a servant presented him with tea.

Saying so, the father sent his daughter inside, while he followed with his umbrella to the study. The child brought tea.

chinese: 宝玉笑道：“只从那个月见了你，我叫你往书房里来，谁知接接连连许多事情，就把你忘了。”
english: 'After I invited you round to my study that day,' said Bao-yu, 'a whole lot of things seemed to happen one after the other, and I'm afraid I quite forgot about your visit.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Well, I can tell you about me from the month before this when we saw each other on the moon, but all I can say is that many adventures had gone by the time I got round to telling you.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Jade said, "Since I saw you that month, I sent for you to the study room and didn't know what would happen next."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Didn't you know? When you were here the other day, my name came up so frequently that you practically forgot me!'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Bao Yu smiled and said, "Ever since that month when I asked you to come to the study, I've been caught up with a string of things and forgot all about it."
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

I forgot to tell you that I saw you at the moon and called you to come to the study room. But then, many things happened in a row and I forgot about it.</s>

chinese: “既然是叶老师交待的，就观测吧，反正也不费劲，百分之一的精度。 用老古董COBE就行了。”

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If the叶老师所讲的就是真的维多利亚号数据,那就观察吧。不费力,也不浪费,我们只用老古董COBE就能得到百分之一点的精度。'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Since it's the teacher, let's observe. It won't take much effort anyway. We can use the old COBE.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Well since it's from Professor Ye, we can observe it too. It shouldn't be too difficult, and even if the accuracy is only one percent, COBE should be able to do the job.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Since it's Professor Ye's instruction, let's proceed with the observation. It's not a strain anyway, just 1% accuracy. We can use the old COBE satellite for this."

end_header_id|>

"Since it's what the teacher has instructed, let's observe it anyway. It won't take much effort and the precision is only one percent. Using the old COBE will do."

chinese: 夫妻二人半世只生此女，一旦失去，何等烦恼，因此昼夜啼哭，几乎不顾性命。 看看一月，士隐已先得病，夫人封氏也因思女构疾，日日请医问卦。
english: The shock of so sudden a loss to a middle-aged couple who had only ever had the one daughter can be imagined. In tears every day and most of the night, they almost lost the will to go on living, and after about a month like this first Shi-yin and then his wife fell ill, so that doctors and diviners were in daily attendance on them.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): In their day together they had brought up the girl, but since then she has lost all capacity for them and their whole existence has been a misery-tingly one. They cry night and day, yet when their wife, Qian Xi-feng, has every opportunity of recovering, she goes straight to the doctor and gets her treated.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The husband and wife had only one daughter for half a lifetime, and now that she was gone, what kind of trouble would they have? They were crying day and night, almost ignoring their lives. Looking at the month, Mr. Xue has already got sick first, and Mrs. Fan has also been ill due to thinking about her daughter, so she is constantly asking doctors and consulting divinities every day.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The parents of this illegitimate child had, throughout their married life, bred the girl with unmeasured love and devotion; now, suddenly deprived of its last bearer, was struggling with the most extreme distress. The weeping over the loss of this beloved child affected the parents so keenly that it contrived to aggravate their own ill health. Daily visits were made to the best physicians in town and to all kinds of astrologers, but without the slightest apparent effect.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The husband and wife had only this daughter in all their years together, and the loss of her brought them such distress that they cried day and night, nearly ignoring their own lives. After a month, Shih Yin had already fallen ill, and his wife Feng Si's condition had also deteriorated from her grief for their daughter, as she sought daily medical advice and consulted the oracle.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

The couple had only one daughter in their entire lifetime, and once she was gone, they were consumed with grief. They cried day and night, almost to the point of neglecting their own well-being. After a month, the husband had fallen ill, and the wife, consumed by thoughts of their daughter, was constantly seeking medical advice.</s>

chinese: 皇帝和大官都很残忍，心里不喜欢谁，就说他犯了罪，把他放在鼎里活活煮熟。
english: Those ancient Emperors and great ministers were very cruel. If they didn't like somebody, they would pretend that they had committed some crime or other, and then they would put them in a cauldron and boil them.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The Emperor and the Ministers were all too残忍, and when they heard that someone had been acting strangely, they would say that they had been deceived and accuse him of having committed a crime and burning alive right on the pottables.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Emperors and high officials were cruel, and if they disliked someone, they would put him in a pot of boiling water to cook alive.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If a man was unliked by the rulers, they would accuse him of a fault for which there was no punishment, and he would be boiled alive in a cauldron.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Emperors and high officials were both cruel. If they did not like someone, they would claim that person had committed a crime and have them boiled alive in a cauldron.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

Emperor and high officials were very cruel. If they didn't like someone's heart, they would say he committed a crime and put him in the cauldron to boil alive.</s>

chinese: 若迟了一步，回事的人多了，就难说了。

chinese: 王琦瑶到家后，她母亲已炖了鸡汤和红枣桂圆汤，什么话也没有地端给她喝，也不看那孩子一眼，就当没这个人似的。
english: When Wang Qiyao came home the next day, her mother had already prepared a pot of chicken broth and the customary bowl of soup with red jujube and longan, which was supposed to be so nourishing for new mothers. She handed the bowl to her daughter in silence. She did not bother to even look at her granddaughter; it was as if the child did not exist.

chinese: 莺儿满心委屈，见姑娘说，不敢出声，只得放下钱来，口内嘟囔说：“一个做爷的，还赖我们这几个钱，连我也瞧不起!
english: Oriole smarted with the injustice of this, but her mistress had ordered it, so she had to pay up without arguing. She could not, however, forbear a few rebellious mutterings: 'Huh! One of the masters! Cheating a maid out of a few coppers! Even I should be ashamed!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It was with a good grace that Oriole let her out of the trap. She didn't dare make any noise, but simply put her hands where she did not want her to see her. 'I'm too low down,' she mumbled to herself as she spoke. 'I don't think we should treat one of the adults like this; the way they treated my aunt!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Ling'er was full of resentment, hearing the maid say that she dared not speak, so she only put down her money, muttering, "A man who owes us some money? I can't look down upon him!"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Willoughby saw that she was making a mistake and begged her not to do so. But courtly manners did not allow him to go any further. Oriole hung his head and took the money without making a noise, but secretly muttering to himself he felt very badly about what appeared to be a complete injustice.

english: But the four junior high girls had their own revolutionary methods that they believed were invincible. The girl who had hit Ye before took out her belt and whipped Ye again. The other three girls also took off their belts to strike at Ye. With their companion displaying such revolutionary fervor, they had to display even more, or at least the same amount.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Of the four nearby middle-school students, three had been trained as revolutionaries from Primary School, and they brought their revolutionary methods with them when they came to attack Ye. One of them had given him a painful powerball punch earlier—she had also blown a hole in Ye's robe with her fist. The other two girls hurled their pities at Ye with just as much energy. Like the middle school students, they had to perform a heroic show, equaling the energy with which they would do anything for their cause.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: But the four girls from Affiliated High School have their own revolutionary methods, and the girl who just hit Ye Zhaotai with a belt drew it back and slapped her one more time, while the other three girls each whipped her with a belt, demonstrating their revolution even more.

unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: But the four young fighters from the affiliated school had their own "unyielding" revolutionary methods. The girl who had just started a fight lashed out at Ye Zhetai with her belt again, while the other three girls each took turns to swing their belts as well. When comrades initiated a revolution, they had to demonstrate even greater revolutionary fervor, at the very least, matching the intensity of their actions.

chinese: 轿子起行，忽悠悠似腾云驾雾，偷懒的吹鼓手在出村不远处就停止了吹奏，轿夫们的脚下也快起来。
english: Off they went, floating along as though riding the clouds or sailing through a mist. Shortly after leaving the village, the lazy musicians stopped playing, while the bearers quickened their pace.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The sedan chair moved slowly up the street, as though soaring through the cloud, or even as it was merging with the雾海， when the musicians stopped playing and the bearers stopped breathing, letting the passengers feel the rush of motion.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The sedan chair began to move, and it seemed as if the carriage driver were riding on a cloud of magic. The lazy trumpeters stopped blowing their horns at some distance out of the village, and the carriage drivers' feet quickened pace.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): As they set off again, all system of bells and drums seemed to have gone loose and the musicians had drifted off some distance from the village before stopping altogether. The bearers hurried on, feet accelerating as the riders grew restless.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The sedan chair set off, and there was a sensation of floating as if riding a cloud or driving a mist. The lazy musicians stopped playing their drums and flutes not far from the village exit, and the bearers began to quicken their pace.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

The palanquin moved along, floating like clouds and mist, and the lazy drummers stopped playing at a distance from the village. The bearers' feet also quickened their pace.</s>

chinese: 黄宗羲道：“是啊。
english: 'Quite,' said Huang.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I'm afraid so, ' said Huang.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Liu Zongxun said, "Yes."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I'm afraid so, ' said Huang.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Huang Zhongxie said, "Yes."
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

Yes, that's right.

chinese: 然后他们到一间为游客开的通宵酒吧中去坐了两个多小时，沙瑞山一杯接着一杯地灌啤酒，变得更加健谈，而汪淼却早已心神不定，脑子里不断地浮现出那条绿色直线。
english: Then they went to an all-night bar for tourists and sat for two hours. As Sha finished one beer after another, his tongue loosened even more. But Wang became anxious, and his mind kept returning to that green line on the terminal in Sha's office.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Then they went to a bar open for visitors, and Sha drank to his taste while chatting with the other visitors all night long — until the end he was barely able to keep his eyes on the green line.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Then they sat there for two hours at a tourist bar open all night, where Shari said things that were not very interesting but made him talk more, while Meng Jiangnan had already been restless and kept thinking of the green line.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): So, they sat at a place reserved for tourists in a late-night bar. Sha downed beer after beer, getting louder and more animated; while Wang's heart grew increasingly uneasy. What was that green line supposed to be?
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Then they went to a 24-hour bar for tourists where they spent more than two hours. Sharif kept drinking beer and became more talkative, while Wang Miao was already restless, his mind continually replaying that green line.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

Then they went to a bar open for tourists and spent two hours drinking beer, with 沙瑞山 continuing to drink more and more. However, 汪淼's mind kept wandering and he kept thinking about that green line.

chinese: 雨水把奶奶的衣服也打湿了，她本来可以挂上轿帘遮挡雨水，她没有挂，她不想挂，奶奶通过敞亮的轿门，看到了纷乱不安的宏大世界。
english: Her clothes, too, were soaked. She could have covered herself with the curtain, but she didn't; she didn't want to, for the open front of the sedan chair afforded her a glimpse of the outside world in all its turbulence and beauty.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Grandma had also been planning to hang up her clothes, but she decided not to. She simply climbed through the open door of the sedan chair and gazed out at the chaotic world outside.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Raindrops had soaked her grandmother's clothes, and she could have covered them with a canopy like the one that her father had used when they were young, but she didn't. Instead, she looked out of the open door of the carriage at the chaotic vastness of the world outside.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The rainwater soaked her clothes, but she had left the curtain open and, as a result, was able to see the chaotic, spacious world outside without shielding.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The rain had also soaked Grandma's clothes, but she could have hung the curtain on the sedan chair to shield herself from the rain. She chose not to, she didn't want to. Through the open sedan door, Grandma saw the chaotic and vast world.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

Rainwater splashed on Nai Nai's clothes, and she could have hung them up to dry under the umbrella, but she didn't. She didn't want to. Through the open carriage door, she saw the chaotic and unstable world.</s>

chinese: 那东西一听别人谈到它，就激昂起来，蠢动个不停。
english: As soon as the thing heard people talking about him, he became excited and began to stir.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The things listening to other people talking about their bells danced crazily, as if they were moving endlessly.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: It gets excited every time it hears about itself, and flutters around incessantly.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The thing, once hear it talk, got excited and twitched all over.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The moment this thing heard others mention it, it would become agitated, wriggling incessantly.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

That thing just makes me excited whenever people talk about it, and I can't stop moving around.

chinese: 这一条，你能办到么？”
english: Do you think you are capable of keeping that rule?'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But what do you think?'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Can you do it, sir?”
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Can you do this, Goong-goong?'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Can you do this one?"

chinese: 多么丑恶的东西，我上半生一直在用文学这把解剖刀来揭露这种丑恶，现在连这种揭露都厌倦了。
english: 'The human race is hideous. I've spent the first half of my life unveiling this ugliness with the scalpel of literature, but now I'm even sick of the work of dissection.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): What a repulsive thing he is, and how deeply has I spent my life揭露它这丑恶的全部岁月! I've become so tired of it that I don't even want to continue.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: What hideous thing, I have been using this literary scalpel all my life to expose such ugliness. Now even the exposing is tiresome.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): How ugly these things were. I used my surgical knife, the only tool at my disposal, to expose this ugliness for most of my life. Now even I'm tired of exposing it.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: How vile things they are! For so much of my life, I have been using the scalpel of literature to expose this ugliness, and now even the act of exposing it bores me.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

How terrible things are, I have always used literature as a scalpel to expose them, but now even exposing them has become tedious.</s>

chinese: 虽然我奶奶与他已经在高粱地里凤凰和谐，在那个半是痛苦半是幸福的庄严过程中，我奶奶虽然也怀上了我的功罪参半但毕竟是高密东北乡一代风流的父亲，但那时奶奶是单家的明媒正娶的媳妇，爷爷与她总归是桑间濮上之合，带着相当程度的随意性偶然性不稳定性，况且我父亲也没落土，所以，写到那时候的事，我还是称呼他余占鳌更为准确。
english: Even though by then he and Grandma had already done the phoenix dance in the sorghum field, and even though, in the solemn course of suffering and joy, she had conceived my father, whose life was a mixture of achievements and sin (in the final analysis, he gained distinction among his generation of citizens of Northeast Gaomi Township), she had nonetheless been legally married into the Shan family. So she and Granddad were adulterers, their relationship marked by measures of spontaneity, chance, and uncertainty. And since Father wasn't born while they were together, accuracy demands that I refer to Granddad as Yu Zhan'ao in writing about this period.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Even though she was now pregnant, Grandma had been high schooler at the time. Since that moment she had entered into a love affair with my crime, both tragic and gloriously extravagant. For that matter, she had been the bride of the Zhang family, the maiden-in-waitting of my marriage, and therefore, since my father had not yet set foot on land, we called her Remi's little girl. More importantly than that, the topic of discussion about those days was never referred to as Yu Zhan'ao: it remained purely arbitrary. And finally, even my father, who had not yet left the fork of the mountain, could hardly be called随意的，因为他的存在只能从外人看来。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Although my grandmother was at peace with him among the millet fields, in that solemn process of cohabitation marked by pain and happiness, although she was also carrying half a load of my sins and virtues, after all, she was still the father of the Fengjia County, the noble bride of the Northern Plains, but then, my grandmother was only the single housewife who was married by arrangement; her husband and she were more or less free and accidental. Moreover, my father hadn't yet fallen into the ground, so when I wrote about those events, I still called him Yu Quanliao more accurately.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Even though Great-Grandma had consummated her love for Father in the sorghum field, and although she had, with half pain, half pleasure, become a clear-cut marriage partner of the single Wang clan head, it was still Father who fathered my current existence, even though he hadn't quite lost his footing in society. So when I came to write about this time in his life, I continued to refer to him as Yu Zhan'ao. He was still a very effective name.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Although my grandmother had already achieved a harmonious union with him amidst the millet fields, birthing my half-glorious, half-cursed father, who was a notable figure in the northeast region of Gaomi, when she was still the officially married wife of Uncle, their union was marked by a certain degree of pain intertwined with happiness. Moreover, Grandfather and her were always engaged in a kind of casual, spontaneous, and unstable relationship. Furthermore, since my father had not yet been buried, referring to him as Yu Zhanao at that point would be more accurate in my writing.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

Although my grandmother and my grandfather were happily married and had a harmonious relationship in their later years, my grandmother had also borne some of the responsibility for my father's mistakes during their courtship. However, my grandfather was the father of the high-profile family in the village of Gaoliang, and my father was not from a wealthy family. Therefore, it is more accurate to refer to him as Yu Zhan Bao.</s>

chinese: 他甚是得意，说道：“嗯，右脸刻一堆牛粪，可没人出钱来买牛粪的，不如刻只猪，又肥又蠢，生意一定好。”
english: This gave him great satisfaction and inspired him to further idiocy. 'Hm, a cow-pat on the right cheek—no, I don't think anyone's going to pay good money for that. A fat pig would be better—a great big, fat, stupid-looking pig. That would sell.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Good!' he said. 'From left to right, the face says cattle. No one's going to spend money on a buffalo to etch a 'horse' with. I think, then, that we'd better start selling chicken skins instead.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He was very pleased and said, "Hmm, I'll carve some dung on the right side of my face. No one will pay for it because they don't want to buy dung. Why not carve a pig? It's fat and stupid. I'm sure that will be a good business."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): That'll show them!' he said, as he set about刻着一排牛粪。 'A pig, fatter and bigger than anything you've ever seen! That's sure to do me more business than a cow.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: He was quite pleased with himself as he said, "Well, carving a pile of manure on the right cheek would certainly attract no buyers, but carving a pig instead—a fat and stupid one—would surely do better in terms of business."
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

He was very pleased and said, "Yes, carve a pile of cow dung on my right cheek, but nobody will buy it. How about carving a pig instead? It's both fat and stupid, so the business will definitely be good."</s>

chinese: 吾今始悟作画意， 痛哭流涕有若是。
english: Now that I seem to read the painter's mind, My bitter teardrops match his drizzling rain.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Only after too soon do I realize That画画只是填空和流泪的手段。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: I have at last understood the meaning of painting, and am weeping bitterly as I do so.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Now I begin to understand the purpose behind the painting: and I could hardly control my sorrow as I spilled tears over it.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct:
Now I truly understand the intent of painting, 
My tears flow as if in sorrow and distress.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

I now understand the meaning behind the painting, and tears stream down my face as if it's a precious treasure.</s>

chinese: 凤姐笑道：“像你这样的人能有几个呢，十个里也挑不出一个来！”
english: 'But how many men are there like you?' said Xi-feng. 'I doubt you could find one in ten.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): As you can see,' said Xi-feng with a disarming smile,' there are many such people in the house who would outweigh even the wildest imaginings.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Feng Jie said with a smile, "There aren't many people like you; there is not one person in ten that would be worth choosing!"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Xi-feng laughed. 'I don't know how many there are as clever as you. I can't think of more than a dozen.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Niangzi laughed, saying, "How many people like you are there? You could be found in one out of ten!"
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

She said, "Like you, there are not many people in the world."

chinese: “哈，我觉得那是最不真实的！” IT副总裁说，“我用公司的上百名员工进行过一个简单的测试，即使这想法真能实现，人列计算机的运算速度可能比一个人的手工计算都慢。”
english: 'Ha! I thought that was the most unrealistic aspect,' the software company vice president said. 'I conducted a test with more than a hundred employees at my company. Even if the idea worked, a computer made of people would probably operate at a speed slower than manual computation.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Ha! I think that's the most fake!' The software company vice president said. I had tested people on this with a few simple questions. Even if this idea were realized, the speed of the human mind processing facts might be faster than the processing speed of a computer.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Oh, I think it is the least real," said IT vice president. "I did a simple test with hundreds of employees at my company. Even if this idea could be implemented, computers' processing speed would probably be slower than someone's manual calculations."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Ha. I think that's the most fake,' the software company vice president said. 'I did a simple test with hundreds of employees at our company. By using this idea, we found that the speed of computing people against computers is slower than human computation.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Huh," the CTO said. "I think that's the least realistic part!" He had run a simple test with a hundred or so of his company's employees. Even if it could be true, he reasoned, human computers might be slower at crunching numbers than a person working by hand.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

"Ah, I think that's the most unrealistic thing!" said the IT vice president. "Even if the idea could be implemented, it would take hundreds of employees to perform a simple test, and the computer's processing speed might still be slower than a person's manual calculation."</s>

chinese: 奶奶撕下轿帘，塞到轿子角落里，她呼吸着自由的空气，看着余占鳌的宽肩细腰。
english: Grandma ripped the curtain from the front of the carriage and stuffed it behind the seat. As she breathed the free air she studied Yu Zhan'ao's broad shoulders and narrow waist.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Grandma pulled the curtain away from her and stuffed it in the corner. She breathed in the free air, enjoying the handsome, well-defined design of Yu Zhan'ao's muscle-built body.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Grandma tore the curtain away and placed it in a corner of the轿子, she took in fresh air, and looked at Uncle Yu's broad shoulders and slim waist.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): She tore away the curtain and stuffed it under a corner of the sedan chair, taking in the fresh air with pleasure and gazing up at Yu Zhan'ao's figure, so fit and fine.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Grandmother peeled off the sedan curtain and stuffed it into a corner of the sedan chair. She breathed in the free air, watching Yu Zhan'ao's broad shoulders and narrow waist.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

The grandmother pulled down the curtain and stuffed it into a corner of the carriage. She breathed in the fresh air of freedom and gazed at the broad shoulders and slim waist of Yu Zhanbao.</s>

chinese: 道路两边，板块般的高粱坚固凝滞，连成一体，拥拥挤挤，彼此打量，灰绿色的高粱穗子睡眼未开，这一穗与那一穗根本无法区别，高粱永无尽头，仿佛潺潺流动的河流。
english: Barriers of sorghum stalks lining the path stood erect and solid in unbroken rows, tightly packed, together sizing one another up with the yet unopened clay-green eyes of grain ears, one indistinguishable from the next, as far as she could see, like a vast river.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Beneath the boulders were dense, like a mixture of large sorghum bricks, which did not move smoothly apart; they looked at each other in dark green eyes that had yet to open gray: one穗一穗都无法区分开来，似乎这涓涓细流就是长在我们身上的。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: On either side of the road, rows of sturdy, solid sorghums stand tall and immobile like blocks. They grow closely together, gazing at each other, their green heads closed in sleep. The stalks have no end; they seem to be a flowing river.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): On the dirt road, spaced out like mathematical tiles, stalks of sorghum stood firm and rigid, sleepless, with gray-green leaves; these lines of crops merged into one, holding one another悄悄观察。 The end of the line appeared no closer or farther than the beginning, as if they were part of a flowing river.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: On both sides of the road, the stalks of millet, like plates, are solid and immobile, forming a continuous whole, packed closely together, surveying each other. The gray-green tassels of the millet are still in their slumber, with no way to distinguish one from another. The millet stretches endlessly, as if it were a flowing river.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

Along the road, the rows of high stalks of wheat stand firm and solid, packed tightly together, each staring at the other. Their grey-green spikes are closed, as if they are asleep. It's impossible to tell one spike from another, and they seem to stretch on forever, like a river flowing smoothly.

chinese: 可巧凤姐正在上房算了输赢帐，听见后面一片声嚷，便知是李嬷嬷老病发了，又值他今儿输了钱，迁怒于人，排揎宝玉的丫头。
english: Xi-feng happened to be in Grandmother Jia's room totting up the day's scores for the final settlement when she heard this hubbub in the rear apartment. She identified it immediately as Nannie Li on the rampage once more, taking out on Bao-yu's unfortunate maids some of the spleen occasioned by her recent gambling losses.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Rong-mao was at that moment working out a win and winning over李嬷嬷的一些赌钱数目，在此意外产生，迫使他将脸皮子往好处上看，并将宝玉的丫鬟贾芸给定夺了。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Lucky for it, Miss Fanny was just calculating the results of her bets upstairs when she heard a commotion behind her. She knew that it was Old Mrs. Bee’s old bout with her health, and that this time she had lost money on account of the bet, so she was now venting her anger at others and throwing the maid of the little boy out.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Just at that moment Xi-feng was calculating the results of a game of gambling in her upstairs room and heard screaming voices coming from the servants' quarters. It was obvious, from the voice, that they were struggling with Nannie Li's toothy excitement; and since Jia Rui had lost money that day and had naturally to some extent passed his怨言也到宝玉的丫头们身上, the current victim of their wrath was most likely Bao-yu.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Fortunately, Lady Feng was in the main hall calculating her gains and losses when she heard a loud commotion from behind. Knowing that it was Old Nurse Li's illness flaring up again, and given that she had lost money today, she took out her anger on someone else, venting it on the maidservant who attended to Young Master Baiyu.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

Phoenix Auntie was calculating her winnings and losses upstairs when she heard a commotion behind her. She knew it was Li Momo, who had fallen ill and was angry at someone, probably because she had lost money and was blaming someone else. She was about to scold her maid, who was responsible for Phoenix Auntie's affairs.</s>

chinese: 家中虽不甚富贵，然本地也推他为望族了。
english: The household was not a particularly wealthy one, but they were nevertheless looked up to by all and sundry as the leading family in the neighbourhood.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Although, generally speaking, his family was not very wealthy, he felt that he was a member of the elite.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Though not very wealthy, he is regarded as a noble family in his home town.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Though they were by no means rich, everywhere in the area they were regarded as a prosperous family.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Although my family was not exceedingly wealthy, he was still regarded as a prominent clan in the local area.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

Although the family may not be wealthy, they are still considered an influential family in the local community.</s>

chinese: 要好的只好等袭人来。”
english: If nothing but the best will do, you'd better wait for Aroma to come.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Those who are good friends have to wait for her invitation.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Only good friends can wait for Alisher," she said.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The best friends you have to wait for are Aroma and Aroma's maids. They can probably come tomorrow.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Those who are close will have to wait for Xiren to come.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:

"Only good things come to those who wait for others to come."

chinese: 就因为这个原因，我对自己存不存在的事不太关心。
english: So I didn't really care whether I existed or not.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Because of this, I didn't pay much attention to things that might exist.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Because of this, I don’t really care whether or not I exist.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): That was the reason why I didn't care much about whether I existed or not.

gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

I don't care about things that don't exist.</s>

chinese: 东北乡地势低洼，往往秋水泛滥，高粱高秆防涝，被广泛种植，年年丰产。
english: Northeast Gaomi Township is largely swampy land that is flooded by autumn rains; but since the tall sorghum stalks resist waterlogging, it was planted everywhere and invariably produced a bumper crop.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The northeast had a lowland with widespread sorghum, which was planted to defense against waterlogging and produced remarkably well每年都是。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The northeastern area is low-lying, and it often floods with autumnal water. The high-rising corns protect the fields from flooding and are widely planted each year, resulting in a steady harvest every year.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The Northeast countryside is lowland, subject to flooding during the autumnal floods. Sorghum's low planting can absorb standing water and therefore grow in vast quantities year after year to give the village residents good crops.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Northeastern County has a low-lying topography, often leading to overflowing autumn waters. Due to their tall stalks providing flood resistance, sorghum is widely cultivated here, ensuring a bountiful harvest year after year.

chinese: 它压倒了薄荷的幽香，压倒了高粱的甘苦，它唤醒了父亲那越来越迫近的记忆，一线穿珠般地把墨水河淤泥、把高粱下黑土、把永远死不了的过去和永远留不住的现在联系在一起，有时候，万物都会吐出人血的味道。
english: It overwhelmed the smell of peppermint and the pungent sweetness of sorghum and awakened in Father's mind a memory that drew ever nearer: like beads, it strung together the mud of the Black Water River, the black earth beneath the sorghum, the eternally living past, and the unstoppable present. There are times when everything on earth spits out the stench of human blood.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It swallowed the sweet smells of peppermint, the bitter滋味， and as it did so, it brought up the memory of a blood-stained riverbank, as if every moment was but the close approach of an eternal death. Sometimes the earth even smelled of human blood.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: It overpowered the minty freshness, the cornicelli bitterness, and it awakened my father's memories that were getting closer and closer; a line of beads connecting ink river silt, black earth under high-rice stalks, and the past that would never die and the present that could not be held back; sometimes, all things give off the smell of human blood.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It suppressed the sweet fragrance of peppermint, and the pungent aroma of sorghum. It awakened memories that had seemed forgotten, as though a string of beads was sewn together to link the muddy Black Water River bed with the dark earth of the sorghum field and the past, which continues to leak out of its graves; at times, one could smell the bloody blood of deceased beings.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: It overpowered the subtle minty fragrance, the sweetness tinged with bitterness of sorghum, awakening the father's memories that were increasingly imminent, linking together the muck of the Ink River, the black earth under the sorghum, the past that never dies and the present that can never be held back, sometimes, all things would exhale the taste of human blood.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

It overpowered the aroma of mint, overpowered the bitterness of sorghum, and awakened the memory of the father that was growing increasingly closer. One thread of pearl-like silk connected the muddy ink river, the black soil beneath the sorghum, and the past that could never die and the present that could never be held onto. At times, everything seemed to have a taste of human blood.</s>

english: And so, with many expressions of gratitude, the old lady took her leave and set out once more through the back gate of the mansion.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Grannie Liu thanked them all intently but after they had entered the afterside of the gate cautioned her and she had to go on foot.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Liu Old Man thanked again and again, still going through the back door.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Gracious! Gracious! Xue Luisleon thanked her gratitudinously and went through the rear gate.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Liu Laolao thanked him profusely and left through the back door.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

I am grateful to you beyond words, and I will leave through the back door.

chinese: 太君问你话呢！
english: The commander asked you a question!

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The patriarch is asking you a question!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Is Old Lady Wang asking you a question?
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Lady General, she's asking you a question!
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

Who is asking you questions, sir?</s>

chinese: 我和陈清扬在章风山上做爱，有一只老水牛在一边看。
english: When Chen Qingyang and I made love on Mount Zhang Feng, an old buffalo alongside us watched.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): When Chen Qingyang and I made love on Mount Zhang Feng, we heard a old buffalo by our side.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: I had sex with Chen Qingyang on the mountain of Zhanfeng. There was a old water buffalo watching us.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): When Chen Qingyang and I made love on Zhang Feng Hill, a old buffalo watched us from the side.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: I had sex with Chen Qingyang on Mount Zhangfeng, while an old water buffalo watched nearby.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

I was with Chen Qingyang on the mountain of Zhang Feng, making love, and an old water buffalo was watching us from the side.

chinese: 咱们两个说话儿不好？”
english: 'Why can't we both sit here and talk?'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If you're not talking, I'm getting a bit bored.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Can't we speak to each other properly?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): What was it you were arguing about before?'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Is there something we said to each other that upset you?
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

"Let's not talk anymore."

chinese: 他心里很安宁，看着窗帘上的光影，什么都不去想的。
english: He felt utterly at peace as he watched the moonlight dancing on the curtain; he decided to let his mind go blank and not worry about anything that had happened that night.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He felt content, as though the shades of the curtains moved without him.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He felt at ease, looking out of the window and thinking nothing.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He was very at ease, watching the changing lights against the curtains. He had nothing on his mind.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: His heart was very at peace, and he looked at the play of light and shadow on the curtains without thinking of anything.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

He felt very content and peaceful, staring at the light and shadow on the window without any thoughts.

chinese: 这件事有两种可能的原因，一是他下来视察，遇见了我对他装聋作哑，因而大怒，不走了。 二是他不是下来视察，而是听说陈清扬和我有了一腿，特地来找我的麻烦。
english: His visit could be accounted for in two ways: one was that he came down to our team for the investigation, but when he met someone like me who played dumb with him, he got pissed off and decided to stay; the other was that he came down to our team not for investigation, but to pick on me, after hearing that Chen Qingyang and I had a love affair.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): There were two possible causes for this: one was that he had come down to see me after he heard my response, and met with my silence and slowness in response, which caused him great anger and ended the both' s career. The other possibility was that he wasn't actually here but some other wayward brother of his, who had heard of my relationship with Chen Qingyang and came to trouble me.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: There are two possible reasons for this, one is that he came down to inspect and saw me being deaf and dumb, so he was furious and left. The other possibility is that he did not come down to inspect but heard that Chen Qingyang had been having a fling with me and came to trouble me specifically.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): There could be two possible explanations for why he might have left: either he had come down to investigate and found me covering my ears, or he wasn't there to investigate but was after Chen Qingyang and me.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: There are two possible reasons for this: either he descended to inspect and encountered me ignoring him, which enraged him so much that he refused to leave; or he did not come to inspect, but rather had heard about a relationship between Chen Qingyang and myself, coming specifically to cause me trouble.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

There are two possible reasons for this incident. The first is that he came to inspect and encountered me pretending to be deaf and mute, which made him very angry and he didn't leave. The second possibility is that he didn't come to inspect but heard about my affair with Chen Qingyang and came to cause trouble for me specifically.</s>

chinese: 过了一些时候，我到清平赶街，遇上了同学。
english: After a while, I traveled to the market in Qingping and ran into some classmates.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): After a wait, I went to the market in Qingping with a classmate.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: A little later, I went to Qingping Market to go shopping. There I ran into a classmate.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): After a while, I went to Qingping market to buy some things and ran into one of my classmates.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: After some time, I went to Qingping to do some shopping and ran into a classmate.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

After some time, I went to Qingping and ran into a friend.</s>

chinese: 这件事传出去对谁都没好处，所以就没向上报告，只是在农场内部通缉王二和陈清扬。
english: It wouldn't have been good for any of us if that news had gotten out. So they didn't report us, only issued a wanted poster on the farm.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): We wanted to keep this info out of the upper strata of the farm staff, so we didn't report it to the production department and spread it around within the farm community as a warning.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: This will do no good to anyone, so they didn’t report it and just had the two men on their farm arrested.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The reason we didn't report it to anyone was that it would be bad for both of us. So we decided not to report them. We just launched a search operation inside our farm for Wang Er and Chen Qingyang.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The leak of this incident would be detrimental to everyone involved, so it was not reported upwards; instead, Wang Er and Chen Qingyang were merely wanted within the confines of the farm.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

This incident will not benefit anyone, so it was not reported to the authorities. Instead, it was only kept within the farm and spread to Wang Er and Chen Qingyang.</s>

chinese: 惯养娇生笑你痴，菱花空对雪澌澌。
english: 'Fond man, your pampered child to cherish so— That caltrop-glass which shines on melting snow!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): No wonder you look stupid 'tween the sexes.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Coddled by a pampered child, you make me laugh, while the snowflakes dance around the mirror.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Youthful pleasures you have always in view, O Husha! Your pool of snow freezes nought but with tealeaf smoke.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct:
Pampered and spoiled, you laugh at my foolishness,
Only the crystal lotus blossom reflects the silent snow.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

The text translates to: "Spoil you with affection and make you laugh, but the lotus flowers are empty against the snowy waves."</s>

chinese: 他们杀人越货，精忠报国，他们演出过一幕幕英勇悲壮的舞剧，使我们这些活着的不肖子孙相形见绌，在进步的同时，我真切地感到种的退化。
english: They killed, they looted, and they defended their country in a valiant, stirring ballet that makes us unfilial descendants who now occupy the land pale by comparison. Surrounded by progress, I feel a nagging sense of our species' regression.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): During his lifetime he committed no less than a dozen crimes: his heroism and fidelity combined to make a sacred contribution to the ballet of death in which he performed scenes with a passionate beauty of emotion. ' These killers they performed before our living子孙 as prodigiously as well as inspiring ones, so that we these dead sons of tears have the distinct impression that our progeny is deteriorating ourselves.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: They killed and looted, they were chivalrous, they were patriotic, they performed a series of heroic tragedies that made us living descendants look inferior, while at the same time I felt a sense of decline.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): They murderers and robbers, but they performed dramas of valour and beauty that made us who we aren't. As I grew older, I felt stronger empathy for the peasants, and my sense of loss grew stronger.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: They committed murder and robbery, serving their country with utmost loyalty. They staged heroic and tragic ballets that make us, their ungrateful descendants, look pale by comparison. As we progress, I genuinely feel a sense of degeneration within our species.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

They killed people for profit, and they performed a magnificent dance of loyalty to their country. However, in doing so, they have set a bad example for us living descendants. As we progress, I feel the degeneration of our kind.</s>

chinese: 汪淼现在意识到，《三体》的玩家，可能相当一部分是他们这样的社会精英。
english: Wang now realized that a considerable number of Three Body players were probably social elites like them.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Wang realizes now that some players on Three Body indeed are elite products of society.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Wang Mao now realizes that the players of Three Body might be quite a large part of their own kind, the social elites.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Now, aware that many players were probably as sophisticated as or more sophisticated than them, Wang had a feeling for the book that surprised even himself.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Now Wang Miao realized that quite a few of the players of "The Three-Body Problem" might be social elites like them.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

"Players of Three Body" may include a significant portion of socially elite individuals.

chinese: 海老公道：“哼，掀住肩头有什么用？
english: 'That's no good!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Well, of course it has no use!' said the old eunuch.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Hai Hongguang said, "Humph, what good is it to hold your shoulders up?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Oh, I doubt if it would have done any good, ' said the old eunuch.

chinese: 我就静静的躺一躺也好啊。”
english: I shall be all right if I lie here quietly on my own.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I'd prefer to rest quietly here, that would be really good.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: I would rather lie down quietly."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I could lie down without crying.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Just lying quietly would be fine for me too."
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:

I just want to lie down and be still.</s>

chinese: 钱老板道：“这是沐王府的郡主。”
english: 'She's the Little Countess,' said Butcher Qian. The Mu Family's Little Countess.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): That's the Little Countess of Mu Kingdom,' said Butcher Qian.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Mr. Qian said, "This is the princess of Muzhou."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): This is the Mu family's Little Countess,' said the butcher.

end_header_id|>

This is the Princess of the Mu Wangfu.</s>

chinese: 韦小宝应了，走进房中，只见桌上放着碗筷，四菜一汤，没人动过，忙道：“公公，你不吃饭？
english: 'Yes, Goong-goong!' Trinket walked across to the dining-table, where bowls and chopsticks had been laid, four dishes and a soup, all untouched. 'Goong-goong, aren't you eating?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Trinket responded promptly and followed him into the room. To his amazement, there was barely anything on the table: rice, soup, two small dishes, and a few chopsticks, except that there seemed to have been no food taken by the two of them at all. 'Goong-goong, you're the only one left,' he said. 'Nothing's gone to the kitchen anyway, which means... oh well, I'm afraid that means you've got nothing to eat.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Wu Xiaoya nodded and entered the room. He saw that there were bowls and chopsticks on the table, four dishes with one bowl of soup, no one had touched them. He hurriedly said, "Grandfather, don't you want to eat?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Trinket went in after. There was now, however, a table and utensils laid out and four distinct dishes with their respective sauces were placed on top of the table, indicating that supper had been prepared but nobody seemed to have touched it. Trinket hurriedly asked: 'Goong-goong, don't you feel like eating?
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Venerable One, Xiao Bao replied, walked into the room, and saw bowls and chopsticks on the table with four dishes and a soup. Noticing that no one had touched them, he hurriedly said, "Grandfather, you aren't eating?"
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

Weixiaobao answered, walked into the room and saw a bowl of rice, four dishes and soup on the table, untouched. He exclaimed, "Grandpa, didn't you eat?"</s>

chinese: 半日鸦雀不闻。 忽见两个人抬了一张炕桌来，放在这边炕上，桌上碗盘摆列，仍是满满的鱼肉，不过略动了几样。
english: A long silence ensued in which not so much as a cheep could be heard; then two women came in bearing a small, low table which they set down on the kang. It was covered with bowls and dishes containing all kinds of meat and fish, only one or two of which appeared to have been touched.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): After some hesitation he heard a sound which, though not distinct, appeared to come from inside. Some moment afterwards the same sort of sounds arose, but this time there were two figures搬了张餐桌过来，放在一边炕上。 Inside it were bowls and plates already laid out, but barely any fish or meat at all.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: There was silence for half a day. Then, two men came with a bed table and placed it on this side of the bed. The bowls and dishes were still full of fish and meat, but they had been moved around a little.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Quietly quiet were the streets until half way through, when two figures began moving around among the villagers' belongings and set down a meal on the floor between them. The only changes made to this already changed dish were a few little moves here and there.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Half a day passed with not a sound. Suddenly, I saw two people carrying a table, which they placed on this side of the bed. The dishes on the table were still full of fish and meat, though some items had been moved around slightly.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

Half a day had passed and no bird was heard. Suddenly, two people brought a table and placed it on this side of the bed, with bowls and plates arranged neatly on top. Though the table was full of meat, it had been slightly moved around.</s>

chinese: 二奶奶搂抱着小姑姑，心里泛滥着甜蜜忧愁。
english: Second Grandma was enjoying the sweetness of her sorrows as she hugged Little Auntie.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It filled second Grandma's heart the甜蜜和烦恼一起涌上心头。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Grandma Two hugged her little niece, and the sweetness of it overwhelmed her with a touch of sadness.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): With her arms wrapped around her little maid, Second Grandma was filled with sweet longing.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Auntie Er held onto her little cousin, her heart overflowing with a sweet melancholy.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

The two grandmothers are hugging each other, with their hearts overflowing with sweet and anxious emotions.</s>

chinese: 宝钗见贾环急了，便瞅了莺儿一眼，说道：“越大越没规矩!
english: Bao-chai could see that Jia Huan was rattled, and darting a sharp look at Oriole, commanded her to yield. 'You grow more unmannerly every day,' she told her.

chinese: 薛蟠忙道：“好兄弟，我原为求你快些出来，就忘了忌讳这句话，改日你要哄我，也说我父亲，就完了。”
english: 'Now look here, old chap,' said Xue Pan, getting agitated, 'it was only because I wanted to fetch you out a bit quicker. I admit it was very wrong of me to make free with your Parent, but after all, you've only got to mention my father next time you want to fool me and we'll be quits!'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Please, friend,' said BP, 'I beg you not to refuse me. I had forgotten your request, because I thought you would; but this time I beg good grace. I want you to look after me as fully as you could desire: and then I promise that I will try my best to see you again before long. Please, please tell any other people you meet that I love you!'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Xuepan hurriedly said, "Good brother, I originally wanted you to come out quickly, so I forgot the taboo and changed it for tomorrow. If you want to deceive me, just say my father's name."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Ah brother!" said Trinket fraudulently. 'I really meant to wait till we had a bit of something in the system before I mentioned it. Otherwise I might forget, and next time I want to persuade you with a lie, I shall say your old man's name instead of what he really is.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Xue Pan hurriedly said, "Dear brother, I was only trying to hurry you out, so I forgot that taboo phrase. If you ever tease me in the future, just say my father, and it will be settled."
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

"Hey brother, I forgot to be mindful of that, so I'll say it now. Next time you want to tease me, just say it to my father and it's all good."</s>

chinese: 父亲早就知道余司令的队伍连聋带哑连瘸带拐不过四十人，但这些人住在村里时，搅得鸡飞狗跳，仿佛满村是兵。
english: Father knew all along that Commander Yu's troops numbered no more than forty – deaf, mute, and crippled included. But when they were quartered in the village, they had stirred things up so much, with chickens squawking and dogs yelping, that you'd have thought it was a garrison command.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): 他知道红卫兵的队伍超过四十人时,余司令的队伍总是抬着头，耳朵里听到什么动静，后门总有一扇不开，腿脚不灵迅速日日给村子里的牲口解工;或是因拉屎拉尿把家禽撞伤或撞翻,村里的老母鸡老公鸡因为受了伤只能喂猪吃,鸟儿们因为受了伤害只能喂野兔吃。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Father had known that the Red Army unit led by Yu was composed of only forty men who were deaf, dumb, blind and crippled, but these people made a huge ruckus when they lived in the village, as if the whole village was full of soldiers.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Commander Yu's forty men consisted of both deaf and blind, and both lame and crippled individuals; yet when they first moved into the village, everything seemed livelier than usual, as if it was infested with soldiers.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Father had long known that Colonel Yu's group numbered no more than forty men, who were both deaf and dumb, and lame or crippled. Yet, when these individuals took up residence in the village, they caused such chaos that it felt as though the entire place was filled with soldiers.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

Father knew that the troop led by Yushi was only around forty people, but when they were living in the village, they caused a stir that made it seem like the whole village was full of soldiers.</s>

chinese: 空空道人听如此说，思忖半晌，将这《石头记》再检阅一遍。
english: For a long time Vanitas stood lost in thought, pondering this speech. He then subjected the Story of the stone to a careful second reading.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Trinket read them all again, thinking carefully about them. 'All the Book of the Burning Sun does not know,' he said to himself, 'and what great beauty lies within these pages!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The Immortal Shen Huang listened, pondered for a while and re-read The Dream of the Red Chamber again.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Seeing this, Vanitas reflected for some minutes and went through the story of The Story of the Stone once more.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: After hearing this, Empty Man listened thoughtfully for a while, then re-examined the 'Record of the Stone'.
