chinese: 他拿起一副走到车外戴上，透过镜片看到的城市夜景没有变化，只是暗了些，这时他才想起要将开关打开，立刻，城市化作一团团朦胧的光晕，大部分亮度固定，还有一些闪烁或移动着。
english: He put the glasses on and looked around. The city looked the same as before, only dimmer. Then he remembered that he had to switch them on. The city turned into many hazy glowing halos. Most were fixed, but a few flickered or moved.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He hurried after them, putting on a pair of glasses and following them as they went down the road. The scenery outside remained the same, but this left the man wondering about the flashing lights: was it on or off? He quickly rectified the mistake when he realized that he had to turn the light on. Immediately all the city lights dimmed, replaced by a blanket of intermittent glints and flickering lights.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He picked up the glasses and walked out of the car, putting them on. The city scene outside had not changed at all, just being dimmer. Only then did he realize that he should turn on the switch, and instantly, the city was transformed into a foggy glow. Most of it was still fixed brightness, but there were also some flickering or moving lights.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He took off his glasses and went outside. The night view of the city was unaltered, but there was a dimmer touch to it. He remembered to turn on the lights right away, and the city lit up once again, most of the lights stable, but with here and there a flicker or a move.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: He picked up a pair and stepped outside to put them on. Despite the cityscape's unchanging appearance through the lenses, it was darker now. It was only then that he remembered to turn on the switches. Instantly, the city transformed into a cluster of hazy luminescent orbs. Most of the brightness remained constant, while some flickered or moved about.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

He picked up a pair of glasses and walked outside to put them on. Looking through the lenses, he saw the cityscape in the dark, but it was not as bright as before. Only then did he realize he needed to turn on the switch, and immediately, the city transformed into a hazy glow, with some parts remaining stationary and others flickering or moving.

chinese: 过了好久，她才将悬空的手臂放下来，缓缓起身走上台，坐在父亲的遗体边，握起他的一只已凉下来的手，两眼失神地看着远方。
english: After a long time, she finally let her arms down, walked slowly onto the stage, sat next to her father's body, and held one of his already-cold hands, her eyes staring emptily into the distance.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Not很久，她终于把双手放到身体两侧，缓慢地从席上起身，走到父亲的侧方，握住他那只已经冷却了的 arm，目光呆滞地望着天际。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: It was a long time before she lowered her hand, rose slowly and sat down beside her father's body, holding his cool hand with both hands, staring at the distant horizon with blank eyes.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Only after a long while did she raise her head and get up, walking slowly until she sat next to Father's corpse, holding the hand of one who was now cold. Her eyes were empty as she looked lost in the distance.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: After a long while, she lowered her arm that had been held aloft, slowly rose from her seat, walked up to the stage, sat down beside her father's body, and took hold of one of his cold hands. Her eyes were vacant as they looked out into the distance.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

After a long time, she finally lowered her hand that was floating in the air, slowly walked up to the stage and sat beside her father's body, holding his hand that had gone cold. She gazed off into the distance with a blank expression on her face.</s>

chinese: 汪淼看着右岸的人利索地抽回连接纳米丝的普通钢丝，把已经绷紧的纳米丝在钢柱上固定好。

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Wang watched the people on the right shore snap the regular steel wires holding the nanofilaments to the pillars back, and secure the new nanofilament支柱间连线用固定的钢柱。

end_header_id|>

chinese: 他迷迷糊糊的睡了一会，悄悄起身，把那盒蜜饯糕饼揣在怀里，生怕惊醒海老公，慢慢一步步的蹑足而出，走到门边，轻轻拔开了门闩，再轻轻打开了一扇门，突然听得海老公问道：“小桂子，你去哪里？”
english: After sleeping fitfully for what must have been several hours, he got up silently, stuffed the box of cakes inside his breast pocket,and made his way on tiptoe across the room, pausing at each step for fear the old eunuch might waken. Then, slowly and gently, he slid back the door-bar and opened one of the leaves of the door. At that very moment he heard the old eunuch's voice calling out from behind him. 'Laurie, where are you going?'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He did not keep asleep all the time; he crept up to his pocket as soon as he could, just in case he should be woken up by Old Hai. He slowly strode slowly out of bed, held it open for him, and invited himself inside; then he asked Old Hai where he had been.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He dozed off for a while, then quietly got up, took the box of honey biscuits in his arms, afraid to wake up Hai Gourong, and slowly made his way out step by step, until he reached the door, and opened it softly with both hands. He suddenly heard Hai Gourong ask, "Little Guozi, where are you going?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He slipped into the room quietly, took the box by surprise and tucked it inside his trousers, fearful of waking the old eunuch. Slowly slipping out of the room, he softly opened the door leading to the garden and gently pulled the lock on the side door open. He heard Old Hai ask, 'Where have you been, Laurie?'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: He dozed off for a while in a daze, quietly got up, put the box of sweet cakes in his arms, afraid of waking up Old Master Hai, took a step out at a time, walked to the door, gently removed the door catch, and then gently opened the door. Suddenly, he heard Old Master Hai ask, "Little Guizi, where are you going?"
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

He dozed off for a bit, and then quietly got up, clutching the box of honey cakes in his arms. He was afraid of waking up the old man, so he tiptoed out of the room, step by step. When he reached the door, he gently opened it and heard the old man ask, "Little Guizhi, where are you going?"

chinese: 不远处永远有一个工地，彻夜的灯光，电力打夯机的声音充满在夜空底下，有节律地涌动着。

chinese: 黛玉坐在床上，一面抬手整理鬓发，一面笑向宝玉道：“人家睡觉，你进来做什么？”
english: 'What do you mean by coming into people's rooms when they're asleep?' said Dai-yu, smiling up at Bao-yu as she sat on the bed's edge patting her hair into shape.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Dai-yu was perched on the edge of the bed, picking at her hair with her hand as she spoke to Bao-yu, 'What do you want, then?'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Jade looked at her, and smiled at him, saying, "What do you come in here for when people are sleeping?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Dai-yu was sitting on her bed,梳理头发, with her hand up in the air. 'What do you want to do here, then?' she asked, turning towards Bao-yu with a smile.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Dai Yu sat on the bed, one hand up to smooth her hair as she laughed at Bai Yu, saying, "Why do you come in when others are sleeping?"

chinese: 夜色灰葡萄，金风串河道，宝蓝色的天空深邃无边，绿色的星辰格外明亮。 北斗勺子星——北斗主死，南斗簸箕星——南斗司生、八角玻璃井——缺了一块砖，焦灼的牛郎要上吊，忧愁的织女要跳河…… 都在头上悬着。
english: On that grey-purple night a golden breeze followed the course of the river. The sapphire-blue sky was deep and boundless, green-tinted stars shone brightly in the sky: the ladle of Ursa Major (signifying death), the basket of Sagittarius (representing life); Octans, the glass well, missing one of its tiles; the anxious Herd Boy (Altair), about to hang himself; the mournful Weaving Girl (Vega), about to drown herself in the river. . . .
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The night was gray and the wine-red winds brushed against the riverside pinks. The blue sky looked unapproachable, full of green stars that seemed to be the last remnants of the universe. The Crab Clock Star – the masterpiece of the whole universe had died— the Bell Fork star – the constellation had just a remnant of two stars. The unhappy pair of them were hanging from the bridges over the rivers— their husbands would suffer from their grief if they climbed上去. The unhappy single woman wanted to jump out of the river—but she would lose her balance if she did.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The dark grape of night, the golden wind winds through the river, the blue sky deep and boundless, the green stars shine brightly. The Dipper star – the Dipper is dead; the Scorpion star – the Scorpion rules life; the Eight-angled glass well – a piece of brick is missing; the anxious Milky Way wants to hang himself; the sorrowful Weaving Maid wants to jump over the river … All are hanging above.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Under the grey-violet evening sky, a golden wind was blowing, carrying ripples of gold across the water. The azure sky was so dark it seemed to contain no light at all, save the blue-green glints of the three gold stars high up in the night sky, representing Broken Bow and his two sisters, Southern Pearl and her bowl, and a broken eight-spoked well—the Water of Life that Southern Pearl spins from the saltwater of Broken Bow's rivers. Constellations like these hovered above them in the anxious gaze of Tau Ceti, the Cowherd, and the Forster of her heart, and the gazing eyes of her sister, the Weeping Moon, Miriam Halevi, or Mother Mary, if you prefer.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The night sky is a shade of grey grape, golden winds weave through the riverways, the sapphire heavens are vast and deep, and the green stars shine particularly brightly. The spoon star of the Big Dipper - presiding over death, the basket star of the Little Dipper - overseeing life, the octagonal glass well - missing a brick, the anxious Cowherd wants to hang himself, the sorrowful Weaver wants to leap into the river... All these are hanging above their heads.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

The night sky is gray and purple, with a deep, boundless blue sky above. The stars are exceptionally bright, especially the North Star, which is the North Pole Star, and the South Star, which is the Pole Star of the Southern Hemisphere. The eight-sided glass jar is missing a brick, and the red-hot ox is about to hang himself, while the worried Weaver Girl is about to jump into the river. All of these celestial bodies are hanging above us.</s>

chinese: 韦小宝大喜，来不及装饭，夹起一块红烧肉便吃，虽然菜肴早已冷了，吞入饥肠，却是说不出的美味，心想：“这些饭菜不知是谁送来的。
english: Trinket was delighted, and without bothering to fill his bowl with rice, he attacked a dish of stewed meat. The food was cold, but he was hungry, and to him it was indescribably delicious. 'I wonder where they get the food from?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Trinket rushed back to prepare food. Since the recently cooled food had already gone bad, he ate it in a mouth-watering mood. He could not even say what had brought him to this restaurant—the food was already consumed and unrecognizable.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Wu Xiaoya was overjoyed and didn’t have time to eat his rice, so he grabbed a piece of red braised meat and ate it. Although the dishes were already cold, they tasted extremely delicious. He thought to himself: "Who sent these meals?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Trinket was delighted with this development. Too busy gorging himself on the cold cutlings, he didn't even have time to ask for some soup or a rice bowl, so he filled up on the meat alone. Although the food had been allowed to get cold, it did not matter as much as it would if it were hot, and it tasted wonderfully good. He wondered who had brought the other supplies.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Wei Xiaobao was overjoyed. He didn't even have time to serve his food; he just picked up a piece of braised pork and ate it. Although the dishes were already cold, they tasted delicious when eaten with his hungry stomach. He thought, "I wonder who brought these meals."
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

I was so happy that I couldn't wait to eat the food, and I quickly grabbed a piece of braised pork belly. Although the dishes were already cold, they were still so delicious that I couldn't describe the taste. I thought to myself, "Who could have sent these dishes?"</s>

chinese: 这段记忆被浓缩成一幅幅欧洲古典油画，很奇怪，不是中国画，就是油画，中国画上空白太多，但齐家屯的生活是没有空白的，像古典的油画那样，充满着浓郁得化不开的色彩。
english: This period condensed in her memory into a series of classical paintings—not Chinese brush paintings but European oil paintings. Chinese brush paintings are full of blank spaces, but life in Qijiatun had no blank spaces. Like classical oil paintings, it was filled with thick, rich, solid colors.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The memories were condensed into image after image of ancient classical paintings, which was strange. Maybe the place in which they had been recorded was not European, but American or Japanese; like old American paintings, their blankness allowed them to reproduce the的真实性, like a painting on a wall—no need for any color.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: This memory was condensed into a series of European classical oil paintings, strange that they were not Chinese paintings but rather oil paintings. In Chinese painting there is too much blank space, but the life in Qiajiazhou has no blanks like those in classical oil paintings. It is full of colors that are so intense as to be indistinguishable.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Her memory had been浓缩为幅幅欧洲古典油画, 有些奇怪,不是中国画就是油画,因为中国画留白留得多,而齐家屯的生活却是没有留白的,就像一幅幅浓烈无比的油画。
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: This memory was distilled into a series of European classical oil paintings. It's peculiar; either Chinese or oil paintings, with Chinese art leaving too much blank space. Yet, life in Qijia Tun was not void, like a classic oil painting, bursting with colors that were too rich to be spread out.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

This memory is condensed into a European classical oil painting, which is quite strange. It is not a Chinese painting, but an oil painting, and the Chinese painting has too much empty space. However, the life of the Zi family is not empty, like the classical oil painting, it is full of rich and intense colors that cannot be untangled.</s>

chinese: 故乡的黑土本来就是出奇的肥沃，所以物产丰饶，人种优良。 民心高拔健迈，本是我故乡心态。

The greater the insult, he thought, the greater the reward he decided to claim. Accordingly he picked up a cake of layers upon layers of rice-gram flour and stuffed it greedily in his own mouth.

chinese: 潘寒坐下，沉默良久才开口：“有些问题我能够回答，有些不能，但如果各位与三体世界有缘，总有一天所有的问题都能得到解答。”
english: After looking at each of them in turn, Pan sat down and spoke. 'Some questions I can answer. Others I cannot. But if you are meant to be with Trisolaris, all your questions will be answered someday.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Pan sat down and then continued silently. 'I can try to answer some questions, but not all . . . if your world exists, you'll certainly one day be able to answer all the mysteries.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Pan Han sat down and remained silent for a long time before speaking, "There are some questions I can answer, but not all of them; if you all have the chance to get to know the Three Body World, there will come a day when all your questions can be answered."

chinese: 他自觉得胜，心下高兴，只是小郡主不会说话，未免有些扫兴，要想去解她穴道，却又不知其法，说道：“你给人点了穴道，倘若解不开，不能吃饭，岂不饿死了？
english: It was agreeable to have won, but it rather took the gloss off his victory that she couldn't speak. He would have liked to open the vital points that would enable her to do so, but he didn't know how. 'Now that your vital points are closed, you can't eat,' he said. 'If they're not opened, you'll just starve to death.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But he was still unhappy, because the Little Countess had not said a word and he was afraid that her feelings might be hurt before she would reveal what lay behind her strange movements. So he went on as if nothing had happened, 'Now think of what will happen if your Meridians don't open up for us? They say you can't eat anything until they have been blocked! What shame!'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He felt that he was victorious, and his heart was filled with joy. However, the little princess didn’t speak; it would be a pity if she couldn’t open her acupuncture points. He wanted to know how to open them, but he had no idea. "If you give someone an acupuncture point, and they can’t open it, they will starve to death! What’s more, if they can’t eat, what about their lives?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The old eunuch felt rather pleased with himself as he saw the displeased look on the Little Countess's face. He had succeeded in keeping her from eating while she was tied up, but he realized that this was the price she had to pay; and though he knew there must be a way of releasing the bandages without compromising her position, he was at sea as yet. 'Now people are starting to complain!,' he said to himself. 'What have I done to deserve all this?
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: He felt he had won, and was pleased, but since the young princess couldn't speak, it was a bit of a dampener. He wanted to free her from the restraints, but didn't know how. So he said, "If you've tied someone up with a blockage, and can't undo it, they can't eat, and that would mean they'd starve to death."
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

english: To those who stood around the bed and watched him while this was happening he appeared first to be holding up the mirror and looking into it, then to let it drop; then to open his eyes in a ghastly stare and pick it up again; then, as it once more fell from his grasp, he finally ceased to move.

chinese: 这地方一上来就显得有些没心肺，无忧虑，是因为它没来得及积蓄起什么回忆，它的头脑里还是空白一片，还用不着使用记忆力。
english: When you first arrive here, the place seems to lack a heart because it is so carefree—but that is because it hasn't yet had time to build up a reservoir of recollections; its mind is blank and has not begun to feel the need to call on its memory.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The start is very unmemorializing, as if the place not even had a soul. This is because all memories it has have just been stored in an empty memory bank; no need for mental recrimining was likely implied.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): When I lived on Grandpa Liu's back slope, I used it to fix watches.

When I lived on Liu Da Di's mountain, I used it to show people my watch.

chinese: 他想着：“兄弟们一并都有父母教训，何必我多事，反生疏了。 况且我是正出，他是庶出，饶这样看待，还有人背后谈论，还禁得辖治了他？”
english: 'We are both equally subject to our parents' control,' he would say of himself and Jia Huan. 'Why should I create a greater distance between us by trying to control him myself – especially when I am the wife's son and he is the concubine's? People already talk behind our backs, even when I do nothing. It would be ten times worse if I were to start bossing him about.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Well, first of all my younger brothers have parents to go guiding them, so不必寄希望靠他们。况且我也够单身汉，再说再说硬要叫我取经，那可太失礼了; 而且人家也不会觉着我的存在，依旧过日子，什么也没人管我，更没人罚我去去的。'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He thought, "My brothers have been punished by their parents, why should I trouble myself and become estranged? Besides, he is a庶子, and so I can treat him well; there will be people behind his back talking about it, and he can't even be controlled."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The thought ran through Old Colour's mind as he planned to go: 'If my brothers are all under the watchful care of parents who teach them everything they know, why should it be any more difficult for me, who am myself a child of choice, to see someone once or twice a week? After all, I have only got to keep quiet about it all and there are people about who might gossip and make me feel embarrassed.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: He was thinking, "Brothers all have their parents' teachings, why should I cause trouble, leading to a sense of estrangement? Moreover, I am from the main line, while he is from the secondary line. Even if I treat him with respect, there will still be people talking behind our backs, how could I possibly control him?"
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

He thought to himself, "Brothers, we all have parents who taught us. Why should I worry too much? It might even make things worse. Moreover, I am the legitimate heir, and he is the illegitimate one. Even though he is treated well, people still gossip behind his back. Can he handle it?"

chinese: 他让她们等一会儿，再带她们去别处逛，今日有一个棚在做特技呢！

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He told them not to wait long, then took them to another section of the studio where they would see some acrobatics.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: He asked them to wait a moment and promised to take them somewhere else to explore. Today, there's a stunt show going on at one of the booths!

chinese: 父亲怔怔地看着爷爷。 父亲的双眼大睁，从那两粒钻石一样的瞳孔里，散射出本来属于我奶奶的那种英勇无畏、狂放不羁的响马精神，那种黑暗王国里的希望之光，照亮了我爷爷的心头。
english: Father stared wide-eyed and fearfully at Granddad. The glare in his diamondlike pupils embodied the heroic, unrestrained spirit of Grandma, a flicker of hope that shone and lit up Granddad's heart.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Father's eyes grew large as if overwhelmed by something. He focused his flash of bravery and enthusiasm on Granddad. He saw the same look in Grandma's eyes that lit up the heart of the man who had come to guide him: a flickering hope of joy and happiness in the dark, alienation-filling hope of a life lived for.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The father stared at his grandfather with wide eyes. The two diamonds of the grandfather's pupils radiated what belonged to my grandmother, a fearless and reckless spirit of bandits, hope in the dark kingdom, lighting up my grandfather's heart.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Father's eyes, large and round, as though filled with the two diamonds of wisdom that had once shone in Grandma's eyes, were filled with the uncowed, reckless spirit of pannier thieves who dare not畏惧 even the darkness itself. Just what the devil was wrong with him?
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Father stared at Grandpa in a daze. His eyes widened as the fierce and unbridled outlaw spirit that once belonged to my grandmother, radiating from those two diamond-like pupils, illuminated the heart of my grandfather with the hope's light in the dark kingdom.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

Father gazed at his father with a dazed expression. His eyes were wide open, and from the two glittering sapphires in his pupils, the fearless and unbridled spirit of my grandmother shone through. This spirit, which had once belonged to my grandmother and had been a beacon of hope in the dark kingdom, illuminated my grandfather's heart.</s>

chinese: 现在不着急，再聊一会。
english: But let's not rush. We can talk a little longer.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Come on; don't be so sudden! Let's see a bit more of the countryside.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Don't rush now, let's talk for a while more.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): She didn't need to be in a hurry. She could chat with me for a little while more.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: There's no rush, let's chat for a while longer.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

Don't worry, let's talk a little more.</s>

english: Of course, I wouldn't admit it was my fault. Instead I yelled at Le Long.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Of course I couldn't admit that I was wrong and be cursed by you.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Of course I can't admit it was my fault, so I just cursed Larnon.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Of course I couldn't admit that I was wrong, so I called Le Long.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: It is now a pile of ruins, created by humans and destroyed by humans.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It is in ruins now, a product of human creation and soon to be destroyed.

chinese: 陈清扬说，当时她刚好醒来，看见我那颗乱蓬蓬的头正在她肚子上，然后肚脐上轻柔的一触。
english: Chen Qingyang said that she had just awakened in time to see my tousled head on her belly, and then she felt a gentle touch on her navel.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Chen Qingyang said, just at the time that she actually woke up, she caught a glimpse of me lying there, with my乱蓬蓬的脑袋正好盖在小腹上，那时她用轻柔的手把头从小腹上拿下来。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Chen said that at the time, she had just woken up and seen my unruly head on her stomach, then a gentle touch on her navel.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Chen Qingyang said that at the time she just woke up to find my greasy head on her belly, then felt the gentle bump on her chest.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Chen Qingyang said that at the time she had just woken up and seen my disheveled head on her belly, followed by a gentle touch on her navel.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

At that time, she just woke up and saw my hair, which was all over the place, on her belly. She lightly touched it with her hand.</s>

chinese: 这时间的电车，多是些家庭主妇般的女人，手里拎着布袋，身上的旗袍是有皱痕的，腿后的丝袜也没对准缝，偏了那么一点，头发或是蓬乱，或是理发店刚出来戴了一顶盔似的，脸上表情也是木着的，万事俱不关心的样子。
english: Most of the passengers at that time of the day were housewives with cloth bags in hand, wearing wrinkled cheongsams, the seams of their stockings running crookedly up the back of their legs. They either had messy, disheveled hair or, if they had just walked out of the beauty salon, hair that look like a helmet. Their faces were rigid, as if nothing in the world concerned them.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): As for the trolley cars, these were women in family dress skirts adorned with handbags, slanted socks that didn't quite hit the floor despite their best efforts, and wobbly hair; their faces, too, appeared wooden as they stared down from a factory, indifferent to anyone or anything around them.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The electric car of this time was mostly women who looked like housewives, holding bags in their hands and with loose-fitting skirts. Their stockings were not aligned properly at the back, and there was a slight deviation in their hairdos, or perhaps they had just come out of a barbershop with a helmet-like hat on. Their faces showed no expression other than being emotionless, as if they didn’t care about anything.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But it is the kind of electric ride for which the saying 'when the train arrives, all women will be there' is meant. There are not a few dressed like在家休息的妻子，她们手提布袋，旗袍有折痕，脚后跟戴着没有用到一半的筒状袜，头发要么乱得像去理发店刚出来，要么就是虽是标准的西式头型，但因为不对称，有点偏斜，脸上的神情都显得很麻木，好像与天下所有的事都没有半点关系。
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The electric trains at this hour are often filled with women who resemble housewives. They carry their goods in cloth bags, their cheongsams are creased, and their stockings are slightly askew, not perfectly aligned. Their hair is either disheveled or freshly styled as if they just left a barber's shop, donning a helmet-like appearance. Their facial expressions are wooden, reflecting an indifferent attitude towards everything around them.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

This train is full of middle-aged women who look like housewives. They carry bags in their hands and their cheongsams have wrinkles. Their stockings are not aligned properly, and their hair is either messy or styled in a hat-like manner. Their faces are expressionless and they seem uninterested in everything around them.</s>

english: If I had, it would probably have killed him.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: If you hit him, I'm afraid he'll be killed.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If I'd shot him, I might have killed him.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: If he were hit, he would likely be killed.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): When he appeared, his manner overwhelmed the person's need for sleep.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: When he appeared, the man's eyes went wide with sleepiness.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The man's eyes snapped awake as he saw her.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I even heard you were ill! Sadly I couldn't attend.'

chinese: 我认识那里好多人，包括赶马帮的流浪汉，山上的老景颇等等。
english: I knew a lot of people there, including the nomads in caravans, the old Jingpos living on the mountains, and so on.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I knew many others, including Thai riders who lived there, as well as Thais who had migrated from Shan territory and those mountain climbers as proud as pricks.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: I know quite a few people there, including the wandering horseman and old ethnic minorities like the Lahu on top of the mountain.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I knew many people there, including the horse thieves who passed by, the Shan guy, and other people like him, as well as the mountain Hui that lived on the mountain.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: I knew many people there, including itinerant horsemen, old Jingpo on the mountain, and so forth.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

I know many people there, including the homeless men who work at the horse racing track and the elderly man named Lao Jing.</s>

chinese: 奶奶嫁到单家，其实也是天意。 那天，我奶奶在秋千架旁与一些尖足长辫的大闺女耍笑游戏，那天是清明节，桃红柳绿，细雨霏霏，人面桃花，女儿解放。
english: Grandma's marriage into the Shan family was the will of heaven, implemented on a day when she and some of her playmates, with their tiny bound feet and long pigtails, were playing beside a set of swings. It was Qingming, the day set aside to attend ancestral graves; peach trees were in full red bloom, willows were green, a fine rain was falling, and the girls' faces looked like peach blossoms. It was a day of freedom for them.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): When Grandma was sent down the scaffold, she was actually a part of history. That day she entertained with her parades of bare-footed, graceful granddaughters, that rainy day it was复活节, pink and lime green, dawning rain, liberated daughter.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Grandma had married to the family of Single, but it was also a sign of fate. That day, my grandmother played with some tall girls with short hair and long hair on the swing. It was Qingming Festival, with peach blossoms and green willows. People were wearing red and white clothes, and their daughters were free.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Her marriage to the Shan family was also part of a divine plan. At the time of her wedding, fall 1920, she was playing on the swing outside their home, enjoying herself with some other girls with high navel rings and long braids. It was Cherry-blossom time, the river roses were in full bloom, and the morning rain was falling lightly.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Grandma's marriage into the Shan family was indeed fate. On that day, my grandma was playing games with some young girls with long braids on a swing set, it was清明节, a time when the peach blossoms were in full bloom, willows were green, and there was a light drizzle. The faces of the girls mirrored the beauty of the cherry blossoms, symbolizing a sense of freedom among women.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

"Grandma married into a single-family household, it was fate. That day, Grandma was playing with some girls wearing long braids at the swing. It was Qingming Festival, the trees were blooming with pink cherry blossoms, and the rain was falling lightly. The girls were laughing and having fun."</s>

chinese: 胡思乱想，一夜也不曾合眼。
english: Torn by these violent and conflicting emotions, he passed the whole night without a single wink of sleep.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): In the course of his wild riding, or rather, in the course of his musing, Professor Li had hardly slept for the whole night.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Thoughts raced through her mind all night, and she could not sleep even for one moment.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But Wisteria Dream was proving an elusive friend, and after a restless one:
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Ruminating incessantly, they did not close their eyes for a single night.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

I had a restless night and couldn't sleep at all.</s>

chinese: 要是白来逛逛呢便罢； 有什么说的，只管告诉二奶奶。’”
english: And she says if it's just an ordinary visit she has nothing more to add; but if they have anything particular to say, she says tell them that they can say it to you instead.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If you only came to see us for a white tour and then something interesting happened, of course you'd like to tell Second Grandma about it.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: If you just come for a walk, it will do; tell my sister what you want.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If we were just hanging around here for no good reason, I'd say let nature take its course; but if you've got to know, give the second grandma a message.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: If it's just a casual visit, then be my guest; if there's anything you wish to discuss, feel free to tell the Second Madam."

chinese: 我的母亲也是小脚，我每次看到她的脚，就心中难过，就恨不得高呼：打倒封建主义！
english: My mother also had bound feet, and just seeing them saddened me so much that I felt compelled to shout: 'Down with feudalism!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Her feet, too, were short and cramped; and every time she looked at her hands and feet, felt sad or wanted to scream: Down with the old fashioned!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: My mother was also a small-footed person, and whenever I saw her feet, I felt sad, as if I wanted to shout: Down with feudalism!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Like others, her mother was a footloose woman, and whenever I saw her feet I felt sad, as if someone were holding my heart.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: My mother also had bound feet, and every time I saw her feet, I felt a deep sorrow, longing to shout: Down with feudalism!
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

My mother is also a foot-bound woman. Every time I see her feet, I feel sad and wish I could shout: "Down with feudalism!"

chinese: 看官：你道此书从何而起?
english: GENTLE READER, What, you may ask, was the origin of this book?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Now, before we go far, let us make a few preliminary remarks.

chinese: 沙瑞山说着，在终端上忙活起来，很快屏幕上出现一条平直的绿线，“你看，这就是当前宇宙整体背景辐射的实时数值曲线，哦，应该叫直线才对，数值是2.726±0.010K，那个误差是银河系运动产生的多普勒效应，已经滤掉了。

'This curve is the real-time measurement of the overall cosmic microwave background—oh, calling it a straight line would be more accurate. The temperature is 2.725±0.002K. The error range is due to the Doppler effect from the motion of the Milky Way, which has already been filtered out.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Sha took a look at the screen. The spread of the background radiation was displayed as a flat green line on the terminal. 'That's the real deal, isn't it? chinese: 平安里的夜晚其实也是有许多想头的，只不过没有王琦瑶窗帘上的大花朵，映显不出来罢了。 许多想头都是沉在心底，沉渣一般。 全是叫生计熬炼的，挤干汁，沥干水，凝结成块，怎么样的激荡也泛不起来。
english: There was a great deal of thinking going on around Peace Lane, but much of it, like sediment, had sunk to the bottom of people's hearts, all the juice squeezed out of them, so that they had solidified and could no longer be stirred up.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): In fact, late at night in Peace Lane there is not a single intriguing prospect in sight, except for Wang Qiyao's windowless room, whose flowers on her door have dried up. Many of them sink deep into one's soul and are eliminated by the sanding machine, where they evaporate like steam.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: There is also much to think about in Peaceful Street at night, but it cannot be seen because there is no big flower on the curtains of Wang Qiyue's house. Many thoughts are buried deep in one's heart, like silt. They are all forced by life to survive and grind down until they become a solid block. How could anything so turbulent come up?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Underneath the tranquil surface of Peace Lane, however, one has as many thoughts as Wang Qiyao's, which simply cannot be brought to the fore because of the thick layer of sediment that has accumulated. Such thoughts sink to the bottom of her heart, to be brewed into something strong through the exertions of real-life chores and demands.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The nights in Peaceful Lane were indeed filled with thoughts, though not as vividly as the large flowers on Wang Qi'er's curtains. Many of these thoughts lay dormant within, like sediment. They were all refined by the harsh realities of life, squeezed dry, drained, and solidified into chunks; no matter how tumultuous, they could not rise to the surface.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

In the peaceful night, there are many thoughts that arise, but they are all suppressed and hidden deep in my heart. They are like sediment, squeezed dry and hardened, unable to be stirred up by any means. They are the result of living a life of hardship and struggle, where every drop of sweat and every tear is extracted until it becomes a solid block.</s>

chinese: 这种弄堂的房屋看上去是鳞次栉比，挤挤挨挨，灯光是如豆的一点一点，虽然微弱，却是稠密，一锅粥似的。
english: Apartment structures are built virtually on top of one another, cheek by jowl, breathing down upon each other's necks. Their lights are like tiny glowing peas, not very bright, but dense as a pot of pea porridge.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The longtang buildings appear to be packed tightly onto each other, with dots of light seeming to slithereardrops of paint on tiny grains of light. Like bowls and crocks holding as many beans, the lighting is sparse even though it is abundant.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The houses of this narrow lane look like they're a jumble, crammed together and lit up by flickering lights that are barely visible, yet dense enough to seem like a pot of soup.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): On the surface, these longtang appear to be a mess, with buildings of different sizes and shapes crammed together, their dim lights giving off a vague glow.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The houses in such alleys appear close-packed and tightly squeezed together, with lights as faint as beans, though feeble, they are dense, like a pot of porridge.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

This alleyway's houses are tightly packed and look like scales, with lights as dim as a speck of dust. Despite being weak, they are densely packed, like a pot of porridge.</s>

chinese: 薛蟠道：“要不是，我也不敢惊动：只因下月初三日，是我的生日，谁知老胡和老程他们，不知那里寻了来的：这么粗，这么长，粉脆的鲜藕；这么大的西瓜；这么长，这么大的暹罗国进贡的灵柏香熏的暹罗猪、鱼。
english: 'Look,' said Xue Pan. 'I wouldn't have troubled you otherwise, only it's my birthday on the third of next month and old Hu and old Cheng and a couple of the others, I don't know where they got them from but they've given me: a piece of fresh lotus root, ever so crisp and crunchy, as thick as that, look, and as long as that; a huge great melon, look, as big as that; a freshly-caught sturgeon as big as that; and a cypress-smoked Siamese sucking-pig as big as that that came in the tribute from Siam.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I'm afraid I couldn't manage it on my own,' said Bao-yu, 'because by the time the month's end there must have been already gone over half a dozen or more corsages and several hundred flowers for him to choose from. They would have cost quite a lot of money, and besides he doesn't seem to have got these from anyone ordinary; he must have gotten them from some experienced people.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Wang Xiaopan said, "I wouldn't have done it if I hadn't been ordered to." He had only dared to do so because the day before last was his birthday, and he happened to meet some people who were not very familiar with him: a big, long, fragrant lotus root; a large watermelon; a pig and fish that were sent by the Siamese court as a gift of respect.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I wouldn't have asked for help if I didn't need to, but it's my birthday on the threerd of the following month and so when I found a fucking thick one down at Uncle Hu's place and a really fucking nice, really fucking long one at Great-Granddad's, I was a bit worried they'd all been brought in by some old chum of theirs who goes hopping all over the place like,' said Trinket. 'And what did I find when I cut open the fucking thing? A fucking big, fucking nice, fucking Hmong pork buns and a fucking big fucking Siam elephant-scented pineapple!
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Xue Pan said, "If it weren't so, I wouldn't have disturbed you: it's just that on the third day of the first lunar month, it's my birthday. Who would have thought that Old Hu and Old Cheng found such things from who knows where? Such thick, long, tender and crisp lotus roots; such large watermelons; such long, large Siamese pigs and fish, offered as tribute by the Siamese kingdom and fragranced with incense."
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

Shou-pen said: "I wouldn't have dared to disturb you, but since I'm not aware of where old Hu and old Chen got these things from, I'll just mention that I'm surprised at the size of the lotus roots, watermelons, and imported Thai lemongrass-scented pork and fish. They're really huge!"

chinese: 为此她没少发牢骚，严先生枕头上也立下千般愿，万般誓，不料公私合营，产业都归了国家，能保住一处私房就是天恩地恩，花园洋房终成泡影。
english: In response to her complaints, he had, in bed, promised many times to move them to a house with a garden. Now that their assets were controlled by the government, they felt lucky simply to be allowed to keep their house.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): For her part, she had made a big mess while taking over the business; Mr. Yan,枕上百般愿意，眠中万般眷恋，终于只成一句:「恩恩，当地政府分给我们的这笔巨款，我已向天报到了，恳请皇上立即发赈，将这处我们各自所有但共建不造的私人花园弄平，新建一栋为国尽忠、为士子耕种的豪华大宅！」
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: For this, she had been complaining incessantly, and Mr. Yan had pledged his thousand words and ten thousand vows on the pillow that all private property would be taken over by the state, and that even if he could save a private house, it was as if heaven and earth were gifting him with such a privilege. The garden villa turned out to be nothing but a dream.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Madame was furious. And Mr. Yan made a thousand promises and oaths that he would never allow their home to be nationalized, but then state-run enterprise became reality and the answer was no to her request for a apartment in the backyard.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: For this, she had complained endlessly. Mr. Yan had vowed and sworn a thousand times on his pillow, but when the system of cooperative enterprises was implemented, all their properties were seized by the state. To keep even one private residence was considered a great blessing from heaven and earth. The dream of the garden villa had turned out to be just a bubble.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

For this, she did not spare her complaints, and her husband, Mr. Yan, also made a thousand vows on his pillow. However, the company went bankrupt, and all their assets were seized by the government. She could only keep one room as her private property, which was considered a blessing from heaven. The garden villa became nothing but a memory.</s>

english: The effort of getting to this appointment had absorbed so much of his attention that it had almost taken his mind off the pain; but as soon as she asked the question he became aware that he was hurting dreadfully all over and groaned in spite of himself.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Trinket hurried over the as much as he could. He had the strength, he thought, to withstand the pain if he did, but when Blossom asked him what it was, all over his body seemed to go churning, and he cried out in agony.

chinese: 看了心里有点欢喜，还有点起腻。 因她们站得远，听不见那里在说什么，只见有一个穿睡袍的女人躺在床上，躺了几种姿势，一回是侧身，一回是仰天，还有一回只躺了半个身子，另半个身子垂到地上的。 她的半透明的睡袍裹着身子，床已经皱了，也是有点起腻的。
english: Standing there watching they were quite excited, but at the same time irritated because they were too far away to hear what was being said on set. All they could see was a woman in a sheer nightgown lying on a bed with wrinkled sheets. She tried to lie in several different positions; on her side one moment, on her back the next, and for a while even in a strange position where half her body extended off the bed onto the floor. All this became somewhat boring.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The sight of them standing outside the curtain made its way inside her heart a little, even though all she could see was the direction in which they were lying. They were a couplee, on their side, with a bed already set up; another was on her back, stretched out on her hands and knees; and a third, one of the women guessed, had somehow rearranged herself so that her body was tilted towards the headboard and that she was lying on her back with her legs over the edge of the room—a single sheet covering nothing but her shoulders. The last picture showed her body completely outside of the sheet, showing clearly how it was beginning to show age.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: There was a little happiness and a little boredom in my heart as I read this, for they were standing too far away to hear what was being said there, so all I could see was one woman lying on her bed, laying in various positions, first with her back turned, then with her face up, and the other time only half of her body was laid down while the other half was hanging down to the ground. Her transparent nightgown covered most of her body, and the bed was already wrinkled.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Wang Qiyao's heart averted joy was mixed with distaste. She kept at arm's length so as not to miss anything, but she couldn't help noticing how awkward they looked standing there. The one woman, wearing a transparent nightie, lay on her side; the other, on her back; and another, only the top half of her body was exposed, her legs dangling off the side of the bed. The thin, translucent nightie added nothing to her elegance; the bed was pitted with wrinkles, and the scene was a little disgusting.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The sight stirred a mix of pleasure and disgust within me. They were positioned at a distance, so they couldn't hear what was being said there. I could only see a woman in a negligee lying on a bed, changing positions several times. One moment she was lying on her side, then facing upwards, and another time, she was only half lying down with the other half hanging off the ground. The semi-transparent negligee clung to her body, and the bed was creased, which also added to the feeling of disgust.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

Looking at her, I felt a bit happy and a bit uncomfortable. Because they were standing far away, I couldn't hear what they were saying, but I saw a woman in a translucent nightgown lying on the bed, lying in different positions, one time on her side, another time with her face up, and another time with only half of her body on the bed and the other half hanging down to the floor. Her translucent nightgown was wrapped around her body, and the bed was already wrinkled, which also made me feel a bit uncomfortable.</s>

english: Grannie Liu could eventually stomach no more of his wife-baiting and intervened on her daughter's behalf. 'Now look here, son-in-law: probably you will think me an interfering old woman; but we country folk have to be grateful for what is in the pot and cut down our appetites to the same measure.

It's not that I like talking about it, but when you get to a certain age and experience some maturity, you start to realize that no matter how much you have, you have to share it with your family - just like the other people on our village estate: they don't squabble about what they've got. They make do and get on with it.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Therefore, Old Master Liu couldn't help but chide: "My son-in-law, don't scold me for speaking out of turn. In our village, every man is honest and eats what he's allotted according to his station!"

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: At first, the boy rolled on top of him, then it was the other way round that the boy rolled on top of him. They had rolled over each other seventeen or eighteen times before they finally caught hold of each other's hands and were panting hard. Suddenly, they both burst out laughing at once, and both felt that wrestling with each other was very amusing. They slowly let go of each other's hands.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Soon the boy was on top of Trinket again, and this time it was Trinket who fell on top of him after about twenty or三十个回合的翻腾, now for a change the straddled ones to be toppled over. Finally they stopped rolling, gasping and laughing at their own ridiculous struggle. Soon they were holding each other's hands and releasing them again, and then, suddenly struck by an inspiration, started chuckling loudly again, enjoying the fact that they found this扭打十分有趣，慢慢地放开了手。
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: For a while the boy was on top, for a while it was Wei Xiaobao, they rolled over each other seventeen or eighteen times until finally they both clung to each other, panting heavily. Suddenly, without any prior agreement, both burst out laughing. They found the playful wrestling immensely amusing and slowly let go of each other.

The boy and Wei Xiaobao were both flipping on top of each other, flipping seventeen or eighteen times until they finally held each other tightly and were panting heavily. Suddenly, they both burst out laughing uncontrollably, finding it extremely enjoyable to twist and turn together. They slowly let go of each other's hands.</s>

chinese: 从路两边高粱地里飘来的幽淡的薄荷气息和成熟高粱苦涩微甘的气味，我父亲早已闻惯，不新不奇。
english: He was used to the delicate peppermint aroma and the slightly sweet yet pungent odour of ripe sorghum wafting over from the sides of the path – nothing new there.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The fainting-off smell of tea leaves drifted in through the field gates, and the sweet orchidainish aroma of ripe sucrose reminded Father of a year ago, when he had grown up.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The faint, minty aroma wafting from the high-corn fields on either side of the road and the slightly bitter, sweet smell of mature corn, which my father had long grown accustomed to, did not impress me as new or odd.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The sweet smell of thin leafiness from sorghum fields along the road and the acrid taste of mature sorghum reminded Father of things he had long gotten used to.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The faint minty scent from the millet fields on either side of the road, along with the slightly bitter and sweet aroma of ripe millet that my father was long accustomed to, was neither novel nor unusual to him.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

From the highland on both sides of the road, there comes a faint aroma of lemongrass and a subtle bitterness mixed with a hint of sweetness from the mature highland. My father is already used to it, not new or strange.</s>

chinese: 到了这个时候我才悟到，犯不着向人证明我存在。
english: By then I began to realize that it was really unnecessary for me to prove my existence to others.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Only then did I realize that it was unnecessary to go back and prove my existence to people.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: It was only then that I realized that it didn’t matter if I had to prove my existence.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It was then that I began to realize I didn't need to prove my existence to anyone.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: By this point, I realized it wasn't worth proving my existence to others.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

I finally realized that I didn't need to prove my existence to anyone.</s>

chinese: 高粱深处，蛤蟆的叫声忧伤，蝈蝈的唧唧凄凉，狐狸的哀鸣悠怅。
english: From deep in the sorghum came the melancholy croaks of toads, the dreary chirps of grasshoppers, and the plaintive howls of foxes.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): In the marshes below, its pitter-latching nature seemed to go deeper into darkness than the swamp itself; to the weasel down at the water's edge sang melancholy croons like a weaver's lament.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Deep inside the millet field, the sound of frogs is sad, the sound of grasshoppers is mournful, and the sound of foxes is wistful.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Deep in the sorghum fields, the frog's cry turns sad, the cricket's chirps turn凄凉, and the fox's howl sounds forsaken.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Deep within the sorghum fields, the croaks of the frogs are mournful, the chirping of the crickets is凄凉, and the wails of the foxes are melancholic.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

In the depths of the marshes, the sound of the toad's sorrowful croak echoes through the air, the cicadas' shrill chirping is melancholic, and the fox's mournful howl is haunting.</s>

chinese: 她订了一份晚报，黄昏时间是看报度过的，报上的每一个字她都读到，懂一半，不懂一半，半懂不懂之间，晚饭的时间便到了，炉子上的水也开了。
english: She subscribed to an evening newspaper to fill the hours of dusk. She read every word in the newspaper, making sense perhaps of half the reports. By the time she finished it, the water would be boiling and it would be dinner time.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): She got a newspaper subscription, and in the evening time she would read through each page of the newspaper, trying to understand them all— but not the words, just the meanings—and by dusk her dinner time had come. The pot of boiling water had already been added to the stove.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: She had ordered a paper, and the time for reading was at dusk; she read every word of it, but only half of it made sense to her, so she would eat dinner when the water boiled on the stove.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): She subscribed to a newspaper delivered every morning, and during her one hour of quiet time she would read it cover to cover, understanding a few words and knowing a lot others; by the time dinner time arrived, the water on the stove had boiled.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: She subscribed to a evening newspaper which she would read during her leisure time in the late afternoon. She read every single word, understanding half of them and not understanding the other half. In between the moments of understanding and misunderstanding, dinner time arrived and the water on the stove had boiled.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

She subscribed to a late edition of the newspaper, which she read during the evening hours. She read every word on the paper, understanding half of it, and not understanding the other half. Between the half she understood and the half she didn't, dinner time arrived, and the water on the stove was boiling.</s>

chinese: 陈清扬一出十五队我就看见了，白天未必能看这么远。
english: I spotted Chen Qingyang as soon as she came out of the fifteenth team—I doubted if I could see that far during the day.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Chen Qingyang was there by the fifteenth team, even though I didn't see far during the day.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: I saw fifteen teams when Chen Qingyang appeared, and I could not see so far on the day.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Chen Qingyang came out of the fifteenth team right away after I left. I could have probably seen her from that distance even on a sunny day.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: As soon as Chen Qingyang left Squad Fifteen, I spotted her; it wouldn't have been possible to see so far during the day.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

I saw Chen Qingyang from fifteen teams away, even in the daytime, I couldn't see him so far.</s>

chinese: 老头子跪在地上，哀求道：“八路老爷饶命，八路老爷饶命……”
english: He rose to his knees and begged, 'Spare me, Eighth Route Master, spare me!'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The old man crawled on his knees, begging mercy for the rebels: 'Eagle-thrower, eagle-thrower, forgive our sins... "'Sins' you say? Oh, my own? Never! I'm at your side, Eunuch! I'll lend you a hand...'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The old man knelt down and begged, "Please spare our lives, please spare our lives…"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The old man knelt on the ground and pleaded, 'Elder Mister, spare me! Spare me....'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The old man knelt on the ground, pleading, "Martial Lord, spare me, Martial Lord, spare me..."
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

"Old man kneeling on the ground, begging: "Eight Route Old Man, spare my life, Eight Route Old Man, spare my life...""

chinese: 那一条条一排排的里巷，流动着一些意料之外又清理之中的东西，东西不是什么大东西，但琐琐细细，聚沙也能成塔的。
english: Something is flowing through the longtang that is unpredictable yet entirely rational, small, not large, and trivial—but then even a castle can be made out of sand.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Things that happen偶然的事儿也是意外的，却又是细枝末节一样，连沙子也浮上不得的。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: A series of lanes and rows, all bustling with something unexpected and clean, not a great deal but small things that when collected together form a tower.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Between the long rows of alleys and streets lies a flowing network of unexpected things, not big by any means—but filled with the sand that, left undisturbed, can also make a dune.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Those alleys, lined up one after another, flow with unexpected yet cleansing elements. The objects are not large, but they are numerous and detailed, like grains of sand that can build a tower.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
end_header_id|>

One by one, the alleys lined up, flowing with some unexpected things that were cleared away. Though not big things, they were intricate and small, like sand grains that could build a tower.</s>

chinese: 她说，女儿建议她去做整容手术。 但是她没时间做。
english: She said her daughter suggested that she have plastic surgery, but she couldn't find time to do it.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): She said that her daughter had suggested that she do a facelift, but she didn't have the time.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: She said her daughter had suggested that she get a cosmetic operation, but she didn't have time for it.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): She said her daughter had suggested she get plastic surgery, but she didn't have time to get it done.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: She said her daughter had suggested she have plastic surgery, but that she didn't have the time.

chinese: 对我一刻也不能放松。
english: People shouldn't let up on me for a minute.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I had to be as gentle as I could get.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: I cannot relax for a moment.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Now, I can't relax for a minute.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: I can never afford to relax for a moment.
